commentaire: Younited is a good platform that offers a fast and reliable initial service, and I cannot deny this.However, I have rated it two (2) stars due to issues I encountered after making an early payment with the "reduce installment amount" option. Despite discussing this with customer service, the following month I was supposed to see my installment reduced by approximately €30, but it was not reduced, and I still received the full amount.I await clarification as soon as possible, especially since Younited is aware that I have paid several installments to close the account earlier, and these were higher payments to finish sooner.I urgently await clarification and resolution of this issue.Sincerely,
reponses: Good morning,We thank you for taking the time to leave us a comment.We are delighted to have you among our customers, however, we are sorry to read that you are not fully satisfied with your Younited experience.We apologize for the inconvenience caused and we will do everything we can to ensure that your experience at Younited is optimal.Do not hesitate to send us any other comments as customer satisfaction is at the heart of our concerns.Have a great day,

En effet, ayant été victime de notre succès à la suite d’un afflux de demandes, les délais de réponse se sont vus rallongés.Nos équipes mettent tout en œuvre afin de pouvoir à nouveau donner une réponse rapide à l’ensemble de nos clients.Nous prenons en compte vos commentaires dans le cadre de l’amélioration de notre qualité de service.Excellente journée,Tracy

titre_com: Never subscribed to COFIDIS CLUB, impossible to talk to their support
commentaire: It's impossible to contact Cofidis reaching out a human being to discuss what follow: looks like someone has subscribed my wife to Cofidis Club on the 6th of September 2023, and we just realised today as she received the first charge after the free first month. Using the automated support tool we have been able to submit three requests (1 for cancellation, 1 indicating we do not remember signing for this service, 1 to request a refund). Anyway the only replies received are: 1 email with details of the CLUB (and the application form which my wife never received before)1 email indicating that the service has been deactivated but no details about a refund. Moreover, no customer ID is present in their email or application form.
reponses: Bonjour, je suis navré de lire votre commentaire et votre note. Je vous souhaite une bonne fin de journée. Julien de l'équipe Cofidis.

titre_com: Je trouve que il faut faire attention à…
commentaire: Je trouve que il faut faire attention à ce que l'on faitCofidis si on empreinte il y a des intérêt à payer
reponses: Bonjour Francis,La Banque de France fixe le taux de l'usure à partir des taux effectifs moyens pratiqués par les établissements de crédit, augmentés d’un tiers. Ainsi, le taux de l’usure correspond au taux maximum légal que les établissements de crédit (comme Cofidis) sont autorisés à pratiquer lorsqu’ils accordent un crédit. Ce taux varie en fonction du type de prêts. Il est fixé à la fin de chaque trimestre pour le trimestre suivant par la Banque de France et publié au Journal officiel. A bientôt. Céline de l'équipe Cofidis. 😉

titre_com: If you're French go for it
commentaire: If you're French go for it, it's the cheapest in the market but if you're not I'd choose another bank. I've never had such a bad customer service when in contact with a bank. Probably with fluent French you're respected as a customer but for foreigners they are VERY rude.I changed to boursorama because there was a good offer but my original application got delayed because I was twice requested extra documents (I'm from another European country so obviously my documents are not in French). Due to the delays I didn't get the promised "prime parrainage" - neither did the person who got me in. Such a scam in my case.

commentaire: I strongly advise against using this neo bank. I transferred €1,500 from my PayPal account to my Boursorama account, and my account has been locked for three weeks now (and it's still locked). I've contacted customer service daily, but they've been unable to provide any further information or resolve the issue. i've had to rely on friends and family to transfer money to cover my rent and other bills since I've been unable to use my bank card or make any transfers. They asked me to send documents to prove the transfer which i did the same day i received the mail and 2 weeks later (after calling them everyday) they told me that they lost the documents??? This level of incompetence is unacceptable; I've never encountered a bank that leaves its customers stranded without solutions. The worst part is that they never once reached out to me; I was the one constantly chasing them for answers. My advice is to steer clear at all costs.
reponses: nan

titre_com: They didn't let me open my bank account…

Moreover, I spent a lot of time to send them all of the f*** papers they ask, trying to respect their stupid parameters. Refused. When I asked just why, "Boursobank reserves itself the right to not answer"... WHAT? Well, I will live without, and keep on using my Crédit Agricole card or REVOLUT when I'm abroad :)
reponses: nan

titre_com: Arnaque / Mauvaise fois à la clôture de banque
commentaire: Beware when closing your bank account at Boursorama ! They will suggest you to instead just "suspend" it so it can be easily reactivated later and so you can get notified in case of direct debit attempt on your account. But where they stick it to you is when they bill you for these direct debit requests (that are refused anyway), something that cannot happen on a definitely closed account And obviously, if you need to close your account for good you will have to pay these fees... Bad faith/theft
reponses: nan

titre_com: New customer lost - terrible customer service
commentaire: Absolutely terrible customer service. Their agents are rude and incompetent. I tried to open an investment (PEA) account with them over 5 times (wasted 1 month in total) and my file got rejected every single time with no further explanation other than 'try again'. Honestly, for an online bank, they really have no idea how to manage an online business. Seems they invest too much in marketing but zero in customer care. Start by training your customer service agents better! By the way, I opened my PEA with SAXO BANQUE -super easy and everything was set up in less than 3 days. I'm glad I didn't become a client of Boursorama in the end.
reponses: nan

commentaire: They have an offer called "Welcome", where they offer €100 for new account opening if referred by someone using the code. But that's a scam. It does not work. I opened a boursorama account with my friend's referral and I did not receive any money. And their customer service is bad. Nobody responds to your email. There's no ticketing system for your complaints. So you're on your own if something goes wrong. Better go for some bank which office physically exists, rather than a virtual bank. Boursorama is not safe because no customer service. NOBODY REPLIES TO YOUR EMAIL. Please DO NOT open boursorama bank account. There's no customer service whatsoever.

titre_com: they refuse checks (of more than 250 e)
commentaire: I moved to Boursorama last year due to limitations of foreign online banks. Recently Boursorama stopped accepting checks of more than 250 e. It would more honest to simply refuse checks completely. Either way this makes them useless to me.
reponses: nan

commentaire: First they wouldn't let me open an account without any explanation or help (while I have multiple other accounts in French banks and a very-well-paid CDI). Then once my account was opened, there was a small registration error. To fix that I've been on the phone 6 times, had to send them physical letters, fill in 4 online forms. They tell me it's fixed but it's not - twice. They send me an email from a no-reply email address asking me to send them things via a reply. What they say on the phone contradicts what's written on their website. There are bugs on their forms and ridiculous restrictions (like 2mb allowance for 3 full attachments). They have no tracking of previous service conversations, so every conversation is from 0. Small problems that would have taken in countries like Australia a short message/call to fix in a few minutes has taken a month+ with no resolution.The full experience was in fluent French (I'm bilingual) -- I can't imagine how bad it'd be if you had to do it in English.
reponses: nan

commentaire: After having spent the last three weeks trying to open an account with BousoBank, I could not recommend them any less. I understood that for the price there might be a drop off in service but hadn't expected to this extent. After providing all the correct documents and even going to the effort of translating them, I received an email saying my application had been rejected. I then called in an attempt for my information, however was subsequently told that this was confidential in very rude manner that made it clear that this was not at all of importance for them.  I have never had any issues previously opening any accounts nor had such bad service. Don't be tricked by the price or offers not worth it.
reponses: nan

commentaire: Not impressed at all by the way the bank tries to foist a different card on you, making your choice for you (with extra charges inevitable) in the announcement that the old one needs renewing. commentaire: I've lived in France, the States, and Taiwan. Over the past thirty years, I can recall having had seven banks. Of these banks, Boursorama is the absolute worst. Their customer service is a joke: You have to dig through menu after menu to send them an email, and then they send you a copy-pasted answer a bot could have sent -- and probably did. And that's just my most recent experience. In the past, when you could still hope to receive an answer that wasn't prewritten, I also had the joy of experiencing the life of a hot potato, with each representative dropping my case after one message so that the next representative could start again from scratch (and often contradict what the previous representative had told me to do).And since I live in Taiwan right now, I cannot even open an account in another French bank. I'm stuck and they know it.

titre_com: How I am supposed to pay with my VISA?
commentaire: Last VISA payment attempt: the amount (<35€) is on my account (even if the card is in credit mode), the payment limit is way far from being reached... still rejected.This is now the third time in a row (of 72 hours) that I am not able to pay (online) with my VISA issued by Boursorama, although I have used the confirmation with double checking process using their App, and I even tried with connecting to my account on a computer and receiving an SMS... rejected, tell me why please!I tried Eliott from the web service, this is the most useless and stupid piece of software that exists, it has not clue and keep looping on some obvious nonsense or this that can be read in the support documents and FAQ (let you feel stupid, keep your documents sorted you don't need this tool).I have tried phoning... or being called back to be accurate, guess what is answering: Eliott... you can listen to its stupid nonsense, assuming you did not get the looping message while reading the first time.The number behind the card is for insurance purpose only, so I bothered someone for nothing... BUT IT WAS A ACTUAL PERSON, pleasant and kind too, thanks madam!Be aware: you cannot even block the card phoning there, very surprising (as all the other banks I know are offering that).This specific point is the first part of the reason why I am writing this review.Second is that I wrote a message 72h ago using the contact form on my customer account on their website and have not received any answer back (just a confirmation of sending the message, which was correctly done with a copy of my original message and questions)...So please guys tell me why it is not working, with all the confirmation techniques and methods I tried?How to proceed to use my money?P.S. the "Cruise API" is returning an error code: CSC 7200058, if it helps?Last but not least: how do I speak with somebody?Best Regards
reponses: nan

titre_com: The Boursorama customer service is going down the drain
commentaire: I used to be very satisfied with this online bank and I have been a client of Boursorama for many years, but recently, the quality of the service has seriously deteriorated. I need to make an urgent bank transfer abroad. For security reasons, Boursorama has blocked the various bank transfer requests I made online. Consequently, I sent them an email through their portal asking for support, so the transfer could be made. While I got a notification acknowledging that my email had been received and that I will receive a confirmation to my email address, I never received such a confirmation. Furthermore, when I check on their website the history of my requests, I can see that the email request that I sent to them does not appear. I have tried to call the customer service several times and each time I got connected to a completely useless robot. As a last resort, I have requested to be called back. So far, no one has called me back. The bank transfer is urgent and I am completely stuck with a non existing customer service. The next step will be for me to close my bank account.
reponses: nan

commentaire: An absolutely terrible bank - at least in the last 6 months or so.I joined them as the default option when ING withdrew its French operations.To begin with, they were OKNow, there is no possibility - literally, none - of getting help in a telephone conversation with a real person.  'Help' consists of the most limited 'chatbot' I've had the misfortune to come across.  It is possible - common - to reduce a request down to one key word and for it still not be understood.  The only other option is by emails, which are 'answered' in 48-72 hours, in a formulaic way, showing that there has been no attention paid to the substance of the problem or - even less - to resolving it.My issue is, in a sense, my own fault.  I made two purchases on Facebook and both turned out to be complete scams.  It's the first time I've ever fallen for this in 15 years but, as I used my Boursorama Debit Card, I knew I should be covered.The only way to pursue a matter like this is by using a pro-forma procedure on their website, which is not remotely adaptable to individual circumstances.  Because I did not have a proper 'contrat de vente', the procedure would not allow me to press ahead.  When I emailed their Customer Services with an attachment containing all the information they required and more, I was asked to send them screen shots of why their procedure had not worked for me and, afterwards, to repeat the exercise.I'm taking the advice of the service juridique of a consumers' association I belong to and will follow the route they suggest, rather than just saying good bye to my money.  However, I've certainly decided to close my account with Boursorama and would advise anyone else to do so too.Utterly pathetic.UPDATE 20 MARCH 20241.  I received yesterday a pro forma message from Trustpilot, to the effect that Boursobank were requesting evidence of my identity, further to the above comments, and that, if this were not forthcoming, my review would be deleted.  I have replied with my customer ID number and IBAN number and will be interested to see if, and how, Boursobank finally respond.2.  My requests for reimbursement of the monies fraudulently taken from my account were refused summarily by Boursobank.  Both my new French bank and my existing UK bank have confirmed that they would have reimbursed the money without question.3. I have also noticed how many of the positive reviews are "invited" - perfectly legitimate, of course, but worth bearing in mind.
reponses: nan

titre_com: Boursorama claims to be an easy to deal…
commentaire: Mise à jour:Boursorama, non content de recevoir un avis client négatif, l'a dénoncé à Trustpilot comme "non basé sur une expérience réelle". Or, cette expérience est bien réelle, et calamiteuse. Ce procédé de dénonciation par Boursorama est au mieux malhonnête. Un conseil : améliorez votre service si vous ne souhaitez pas recevoir d'avis négatifs.Boursorama claims to be an easy to deal with bank. Well, not if you're a non resident... But it's not all. here are a couple of examples:- Opening an account : as a non-resident, you need to provide some tax documents. Guess what: Boursorama does not recognize the official tax return form issued by the tax authorities. Customer service is useless : an other department said "not accepted". Then you get cryptic messages : to continue your opening process you need to submit other documents... which are not specified. When you connect to the website, you can't upload them. So you call the customer service who tells you to send it by email. And then, black hole...In the meantime, you may receive a SMS saying that you need to transfer 300€ to the account to validate its opening. Guess what, despite doing this, the account may not be created. Then you need to wait for the 300€ to be returned and you stat over.- Customer service : very uneven. Some assistants are good and polite, others take you for granted and are the limit of being disrespectful. Explanations on when you receive a message, for what, are less than clear. Latest in date : received an SMS announcing my account is open, and I will get an email with my credentials. (after 3 weeks struggling with the customer service). I receive an email about credit of a bonus. But no credential. Call to customer service : we send credentials 48 hours after announcing your account is open. Ooooh. Thanks for being so clear in your communication!So all in all, the first experience has been a disaster. Let's see how the operations go... Wish me luck.
reponses: nan

commentaire: I am a client of Boursorama bank since June 2019, and I have recently applied to open LIVRET A for my two sons (one who was born in France, and other who was born in Pakistan). During the submission process, I was asked to upload the birth certificates which I did. For the one born in France, there was no issue as it was a birth certificate issued in France. However, for other, I received the following email with following point- l'acte de naissance est incomplet, la date et le lieu de naissance des parents sont absents du document. merci de nous faire parvenir une copie complète du livret de famille ou une copie complète de l'acte de naissance avec filiation de Muhammad et une copie du passeport du représentant légalThe issue is that the birth certificates issued in Pakistan have only the names of Parents and do not have dates and places of birth of Parents. Given that in Pakistan a document similar to livret famille does not exist, I have always provided this certificate to receive official documents for my son (Prefecture, Impots, etc) and have never faced an issue. However, to address this problem, I provided (parents) marriage certificate, our titre de sejour, our passports, etc to provide the proof and date of birth of parents. Given that, i am an existing client (and Boursorama has all my information) I did hope that this info will be fine. However, to my surprise, two days later I received a refusal for an account opening for my elder son. Anyways, I got a pseudo livret famille from the Embassy of Pakistan in Paris and reapplied. Again in a couple of days, i got a refusal.This whole episode is very strange for me. Because I do not understand why a DISCRIMINATION is being applied to one child and there is no issue for the other. Is it only because one has a birth certificate issued by a Town Hall in France while the other holds a birth certificate from Pakistan? Just to let you know the same birth certificate was accepted also by the ministry of interior of France. Therefore, i seriously wonder, if a document that is accepted all over, a bank is not willing to consider (and despite all extra parent-related information that was provided)Getting Livret A is not rocket science and i can get it with any bank (My other account is with BNP Paribas and they are after my life to get these plans for my children). After that i tried reaching out to multiple departments but all in vain. Yesterday, I received a letter from one Mr MEZARD. It is amazing how much attention is given to the details because the letter mentioned the reason as - application de nos conditions generals - but did not have the courtesy to specify what precisely is the CONDITION we did not fulfill. But that is because there is NO REAL CONDITION. It is just profile discrimination (possibly racism?) given that there are different documents (the one that had a French birth certificate had the account open vs. the other child having a foreign document). Anyways I have initiated the account opening with BNP Parisbas (Thank god they have the brains to relate). Of course, I will contact Banque de France but to launch a full-scale complaint and audit of the processes. I am also progressing with closure of my account and my suggestion to everyone will be to STAY AWAY from such a discorteous and disrecpectful bank with a useless customer service
reponses: nan

commentaire: Hopefully this review might help someone looking for some info setting up a French account for their business! I'm English, but living and working in France and I needed a bank account for my freelance business. I need to transfer money back to the UK regularly so I wanted something with easy currency exchange. Here's what you need to know - to have a business or earn money in France you need a French IBAN, otherwise you won't be able to pay your taxes. Not necessarily a French bank account, but a French IBAN as the government websites don't accept non-French IBANs. N26 and Revolut both say they offer one, but unless you are on their most expensive account, they don't. Long story short, I tried N26 and Revolut's mid-range business accounts - neither offered me a French IBAN, despite me living in France and having a French registered business. I swapped to Qonto and couldn't be happier. I can generate my invoices there, get paid, have a separate account to save my tax money into, and the price is competitive with N26 and Revolut. Sending money to the UK is a breeze too as it's considered a SEPA transfer so it's free, even though the UK are no longer in the EU and there's currency exchange involved. I also added my accountant as a member of my team so they can access statements etc. as needed. As an aside, I tried Wise too. Bottom line, just get a Qonto account if you're starting a business in France and save yourself the trouble of shopping around like I did!

titre_com: Qonto - All small businesses should consider them
commentaire: I started using Qonto about 6 years ago when I was creating my first company in France.  Initially I was planning to use HSBC but got so frustrated by their long complex procedures and high cost.  I found Qonto online and decided to give them a go and have never looked back.  They did in 3 days what would have taken more than 3 weeks with HSBC.I have now used Qonto for 3 separate companies and did company creation with Qonto as well as capital increases.  In all cases it was simple, straight forward and the pricing is much better than a traditional bank.My only slight complaint is that Qonto limit the number of incoming and outgoing payments depending on the tariff you are on after which you have to pay a supplement.  If you have a lot of incoming and outgoing payments each month this can get expensive, so this is the only thing to watch out for.Otherwise great service and so much easier than a traditional bank, which often make you jump through hoops to do the simplest of things.Unfortunately I have had to close the account with Qonto for one of my companies, simply because I needed a business loan and was forced to open an account with the bank providing the loan and there was no point to pay for two accounts.

titre_com: Misleading Promises and Unreliable Service: My Qonto Experience in Italy
commentaire: I opened a Qonto account for my new startup in Milan, Italy, incorporated on August 1st. Qonto repeatedly assured me that their issues with Banca D'Italia wouldn't affect my account since I started the opening process before July 25th. This turned out to be completely false.While I managed to open the account and incorporate my company, Qonto recently informed me they couldn't activate ANY cards for my account due to their regulatory issues in Italy. This directly contradicts what they promised earlier, as evidenced by an email from their representative Alessandro, who stated:"The restrictions apply only to future customers, therefore the account opening process for TWINI S.R.L. is not impacted in any way."Now I'm left with a useless bank account, forced to transfer funds to a new bank and close this account as soon as possible. There's also a risk they might retain the currently deposited money, similar to what N26 did during a comparable situation in Italy.This feels like a bait-and-switch. Qonto told me one thing at the beginning and the opposite now. When I called them, they claimed they couldn't do anything about it and that the problem was beyond their control. The real issue is that they assured me the process would be smooth because I was before the deadline, only to completely change their stance a month later.Qonto's actions are deceptive and unprofessional. They're likely to face significant problems in Italy and lose substantial market share. I've decided to switch to Revolut instead.In conclusion, my experience with Qonto has been deeply disappointing. Their misleading promises and inability to provide basic banking services make them an unreliable choice for businesses in Italy. I strongly advise caution to anyone considering Qonto for their banking needs.
reponses: Ciao Davide,Abbiamo letto molto attentamente la recensione che ci hai lasciato.Qonto ha ricevuto un ordine da Banca d’Italia per migliorare le sue misure anti-riciclaggio nella sua filiale italiana. Questo ordine include un divieto temporaneo di onboarding per i nuovi clienti in Italia a partire dal 25 luglio 2024.Ci scusiamo per la poca chiarezza della comunicazione relativa alla restrizione dell'ordine di nuove carte, tuttavia ti confermiamo che al momento non è possibile procedere con tale funzionalità.Ti assicuriamo che stiamo lavorando diligentemente per rispettare tutte le normative vigenti e per minimizzare l'impatto sui nostri clienti.Un nostro agente si è già messo in contatto con te per proporti un gesto commerciale per scusarci dell'accaduto.Se hai bisogno di ulteriori chiarimenti o assistenza, non esitare a rispondere a questa email.Buona giornata

Hallo Urte,vielen Dank, dass Sie uns auf Ihr Anliegen aufmerksam gemacht haben. Es tut mir leid zu hören, dass Sie Schwierigkeiten mit den Videoanrufen hatten. Wir möchten Ihnen gerne die Unterstützung bieten, die Sie benötigen, und werden uns direkt mit Ihnen in Verbindung setzen, um das Problem schnellstmöglich zu lösen.Vielen Dank für Ihr Verständnis und Ihre Geduld. Wir freuen uns darauf, Ihnen bald weiterhelfen zu können.Mit freundlichen Grüßen,

commentaire: I am a business customer at Qonto in one of their highest paying service tiers. Under no circumstances do I recommend Qonto, I cannot understand how they got their rating so high. No reachable customer hotline even in emergency cases, sudden freezing of all online services for days without reason or prior announcement. Way more expensive than traditional banks as well - if there were 0 stars, I would give them.
reponses: nan

commentaire: Bank first blocked our bank account/money over 100.000 Eur without any notifications at all. Than explanation/accusations so strange and astonishing which we received after a while, all silly things; such as 1) Company is based in X city, 2) Owner address is in Y city, 3) Company is doing international commerce and not have a warehouse. Completely nonsense. Than bank delivered our money to Minister of Finance; over two months we have not heard anything yet. Our providers are informing us France government bodies are searching things if the company really trading etc. completely stupid and nonsense because there is absolutely nothing wrong with our company and banking activities. Our business completely stopped we are loosing money ever single days. To work with Qonto is completely Terrible Terrible Terrible. I do not recommend at all. Be very carefull with Qonto.
reponses: Hello Alex,Qonto is a licensed payment institution authorized by the French Autorité de Contrôle Prudentiel et de Résolution (ACPR) and does not have the authority to block funds in the manner you described.As we are unable to identify you, could you please send us an email at careteam@qonto.com and provide us with further details?Many thanks.

commentaire: On April 8, I asked the Qonto team for support regarding a mistake in one of their invoices. Today, May 2, I finally got an answer, and, of course, it is: "We can't do anything about that." I am shocked companies like this exist and have customers.
reponses: Ciao Gabriele,Ci spiace molto apprendere del tuo disappunto nei confronti del nostro servizio.Facciamo il possibile per offrire servizi che rispondano sempre a tutte le vostre esigenze e lavoriamo costantemente a migliorare il nostro prodotto grazie soprattutto ai feedback dei nostri clienti.I nostri agenti sono formati per fornire assistenza in tempo reale a tutte le richieste. Se ci volessi contattare noi siamo a disposizione ti basterà scriverci all’indirizzo feedback@qonto.com dove potremo valutare il tuo specifico caso con maggiore attenzione.Buona giornata.

I haven't heard back since I was blocked.I want to appeal for account reinstatement, I can provide any proof of legitimate funds.

titre_com: Qonto took over Penta in 2022 and…
commentaire: Qonto took over Penta in 2022 and started wrecking havoc on small businesses that relied on having a bank account, by closing all Penta accounts a few month after acquisition. Now over a year after that, I get invoices for April 2023 (note that the account was absolutely unusable - as it would close down a few days after).Edit: They had a SEPA mandate to deduct the invoices, however were unable to use it, maybe because they were locked out of the account just like myself? Getting now invoices for this period of time is absolutely not understandable, creates unnecessary overhead added to the issues caused in the first place already.
reponses: Hallo Daniel,vielen Dank, dass Sie sich die Zeit genommen haben, um uns Ihr Feedback mitzuteilen. Wir sind stark bemüht, jede Kundenerfahrung angenehm zu gestalten und es tut uns wirklich leid, dass wir Ihre Erwartungen nicht erfüllen konnten. Gerne würde ich Ihr Anliegen weiter erörtern.  Leider konnte ich Sie in unserer Datenbank unter diesem Namen nicht finden. Wir möchten, dass jeder Kunde die bestmögliche Erfahrung macht, und wir arbeiten hart daran, dies zu gewährleisten. Bitte senden Sie uns hier Ihre Details.  Wir werden Ihr Problem so schnell wie möglich lösen und Ihnen bei allen Fragen helfen.Wir danken Ihnen für Ihr Verständnis! Mit freundlichen GrüßenIhr Qonto-Team

commentaire: This is by far the best user experience I've ever made with a bank. First I've tried to open an account for my new company at the online bank of the biggest German bank (with the blue square logo). The process took 4 weeks (!!!) with the result that I didn't receive the account - and they have asked for understanding that they cannot explain the reason.Then I decided to give Qonto a try. And my account was ready to receive the initial payments in less than an hour. Everything about Qonto is about speed and comfort. Not only the onboarding but also the support (responds nearly always in less than 10 minutes!), the shipment of the card (less than a week after opening the account) and the whole user experience of the apps (web app and mobile app). It is the first time in my life that a bank transfer has been fun.Also the fees are low, they don't have transfer limits, all transfers are in real time for free and so on. Everything is perfect.After all of these amazing experiences with Qonto I wonder how the traditional banks in Germany will survive. That will be difficult for them.
reponses: Hello Daniel,Thank you for your valuable feedback! We're happy to read that our offer meets your expectations and brings you huge satisfactions. Please don't hesitate to contact us via happyclients@qonto.com for any request. Have a great day! 😍

titre_com: Lost 30.000 euros due to a bug!
commentaire: We've lost nearly 30.000 euros due to a bug on their website. One of our bulk payments went out twice, to hundreds of contractors. They've provided no compensation, we've been talking to their team for 2h / day for 2 weeks so far and they keep telling us to wait / speak to someone else/ etc..Some background to this:We've been using Qonto for over 2 years and never had a problem before. We have hundreds of thousands of euros in our account balance. We pay a hefty bill to Qonto every month for transfer fees and service fees. We send out bulk payments every month and never had an issue before. But due to a bug in their website which is totally obvious to all their customer service staff who've examined our case, they sent almost 30.000 euros twice and have not been able to get the money back. Our request for compensation has so far been ignored. We are going to open a legal case against Qonto for not providing a formal compensation. We continue speaking to their team every day about this and they give no solution. Their customer service is worse than awful. I strongly recommend to any business to avoid them.
reponses: Hello M.Benedito, We are sorry to hear you had this experience. We will contact you as soon as possible to better assist you. Thank you for your understanding. Have a nice day,

commentaire: Qonto is currently retaining some of my deposits and soliciting extensive, highly confidential personal data under the guise of "regulatory checks." This practice not only breaches privcay but also puts me at risk of defaulting on my payments. None of my other banking partners have implemented such intrusive measures.I cannot advise if one needs to do many wires, especially abroad.
reponses: Hello Arturo, First, we are sorry to hear that you had this experience with us. We take our customers' comments very seriously and take them to improve and take action where appropriate.Please note that our activities are regulated and supervised by the ACPR (Banque de France), for this reason, we are obliged to request additional information and proof of some account transactions. For any further questions, do not hesitate to contact us at careteam@qonto.com, we will be happy to answer all your questions. Have a nice day,

titre_com: Transfers being held up | High fees | Inconvenient Pricing
commentaire: Worst of all Qonto holds deposits from our customers and request highly sensitive personal information for some sort of "regulatory checks". It is an invasion of our customers privacy, hurts our reputation and leads to longer processing times for our customers. None of our other banks have done this and customers understably think they are being scammed.Pricing is expensive. Plans are not at all customer friendly. We end up paying for a ton of nonsense we will never use just to get lower fees per transfer in return. Way worse then when we were with Penta Tech is ok most of the time, but not without faults and frustrating bugs now and then.Support ist mostly not helpful. Functionality which everyone in their right mind expects is not there. (regarding Datev integration for example)Can't be fully recommended, especially not if you are based in Germany.

In order to contact you, we would need more details so that a dedicated agent can review the situation with you. commentaire: Qonto was my bank for 8 months then one day the blocked my account without explanations , I had around €10 000 on their account and it was an active business account so that was a devastating moment in my life, they blocked the account and all cards, they did not bother on informing me why the had done that, I sent them countless messages they did not respond until 3 months later , they said the were reviewing my account with no further explanations then it took them 3 more months to ask me about the transactions on my account , without asking me for invoices that support the transactions . They then took another 2 to 3 months to tell me that they were  cancelling my account and that they were sorry . Then began another nightmare in the chapter , they decided to transfer all my money back to the companies that paid me and without any proof of their transfers . I was devastated and angry, frustrated and etc . I send them messages they always returned their response in rhetorics and always closing the chat so that I begin a new chat with another agent. This went on for 4 more months , then finally the decided to send me their proofs of transfer which was crucial for me to be able yo get my money back , I had to send that information to the companies , then those companies told me these are not transactions that our company made . Qonto is an incompetent bank with a lot of incompetent agents and managers etc They have the worse services by far and I would never recommend their bank to anyone, I hate fraudulent banks and this one is in that category. Stay away from this bank. Big Disappointment , as said by many they charge the highest fees on international transfers and they never respond to message from customers .
reponses: Hello Foster, We are sorry to read your comment and that our collaboration has suddenly come to an end.We would like to clarify that the response times you mentioned are not true. In fact, our teams were able to respond the same day when you asked us for proof of transfers. It is true, however, that an agent can close a chat if a conversation is already open on the same subject. Our teams are not authorized to give you the reasons for the account closure. However, this is based on verified evidence that has forced us to take this decision. As an ACPR-accredited payment institution, we sometimes have to guide certain customers towards the exit, when their operations or activity do not allow us to meet our legal obligations.We apologize for any impact this closure may have on your business activities. We also hope that you have been able to find an establishment to welcome you quickly.We remain at your disposal should you need us at support@qonto.com.Thank you for your understanding.The Qonto team

reponses: Hello Hamid,We have read your comment carefully and we would like to respond to you in detail.First of all, we feel it is important to point out that as a payment institution, Qonto can never intervene in or close an account without a valid and verified reason. We will not close an account without a thorough investigation. However, we are not in a position to comment publicly on your case. As you know, our business is supervised by the Bank of France and, for regulatory reasons or at the request of the relevant authorities, we may have to take sensitive and restrictive decisions.Qonto is a financial institution, which obliges us to strictly apply the regulations in force: we are not always entitled to explain publicly, and in detail, the reasons for a permanent closure of an account.of an account.We apologize for the impact this closure may have on your business activities. We are at your disposal if you need help at careteam@qonto.com. Thank you for your understanding.

commentaire: The good things first - Qonto is by far the best business account on the market in my opinion. It has everything a company could ask for. The bad things: Most of the "new exciting features" do not work for many many months, because they are still in beta. Which is disastrous for Company accounts. And sadly the worst part of all is their customer service. You always get to speak to an AI rep, a student or a minimum wage person that is only capable of sending you their FAQ. One has to ask a minimum of 3 times to get real support, if it happens at all. This takes at least 2 days. 95% of the time they just send you their FAQs but are not capable of providing any real support - for any kind of issue. This is the biggest drawback this company had since their initiation and still has today. Therefore only 3 stars, despite the system in general being very good.
reponses: Hello Peter, we thank you for your review and would like to reply to your different comments. Qonto is still quite young on the payment institution market, some of our feature might still be in construction. This is why your feedback is very important to us so that our product evolves and gets better everyday. The experience you had with our customer service do not reflect the quality standard of our service we want to offer to our client. We really would like to understand what happened, and how we can improve our service, could you contact us at careteam@qonto.com ? Have a great day,

commentaire: Former Penta customer forced to switch to Qonto. Got tons of emails in the process about all the positive things related to the change. Like keep all the good things with Penta plus add lots of new stuff from Qonto.(for same price - 10 euro)It’s basically just a scam. With the Qonto starter plan (which according to the tag is the same as my Penta plan) it’s a huge downgrade for the same money. Penta had 100 free transfers per month while Qonto have 30(!!)Card limit on Penta is 20.000 euro per day and with Qonto it’s 1000 Euro per month. 1000 euro per month??? Really? It’s such a huge downgrade for the same price. Of course I can get high and limits, but then you need to pay a lot more per month. Qonto is not freedom for small businesses but rather the opposite; its restrictions and limits for businesses. The whole change thing seems like a huge scam to get more money for a product that are a downgrade rather then a positive upgrade. Ah and also remember you have to get a new account number and I form all customers, update invoices etcNot the bank to choose if you like flexibility and freedom. Maybe nice if you need accounting tools but I already got that - I just need a nice bank like old Penta.
reponses: Hello Hans,Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We strive to make every customer experience pleasant during the transition and after transition. I would be happy to discuss your concerns further in a phone call or via chat. Please email us at careteam@qonto.com. We will resolve your issue as soon as possible and help you with any questions regarding the switch, features and pricing plan.Thank you for your understanding!With kind regardsAndrijana from your Qonto Team

commentaire: The most unprofessional and incompetent bank I've ever worked with.  Since migrating from Penta to Qonto there have been monthly issues with payments, to both suppliers and employees.   Their reasoning is always because of so called compliance but I've never experienced this level of compliance from bigger banks.  So now I have an issue that payments will randomly take forever to process and then declined.  Latest example is salary payment to employee that went through no problem for two months in a row, and then randomly one month got told they needed additional information to process (which severely delayed payment to employee) - they still have not provided me a reason as to why it went through fine previously and why now they need this additional information.  It's unpredictable and inconsistent.  I have no confidence when payments are being made.  they also have an 'instant payment' feature which half the time fails due to 'technical reasons'.  When I asked them what are the criteria for instant payment to work no-one can provide an answer.  So payments to employees takes up to three days, incredibly slow.  This bank is clearly still in start-up mentality rather then lets act like an actual bank and provide a professional and reliable service.

commentaire: Are you tired of dealing with incompetent banks? Look no further than Qonto, the bank that nearly destroyed my e-commerce business! Despite being a long-term customer of Penta, I have experienced nothing but frustration and disappointment with their unprofessional behavior since it is part of Qonto.Over the past few months, Qonto has failed to successfully transmit my bank transfers, resulting in lost revenue and significant costs. To make matters worse, when the transfers have failed, the money has been lost, and Qonto has not taken the necessary steps to locate it promptly. Their customer service was a mess, and their representatives provided me with inconsistent and unhelpful responses.It is unacceptable that a bank cannot locate a transfer after it has been made and does not have proper protocols in place to handle such issues. As a customer, I expect a high level of service, and Qonto has proven themselves to be incapable of delivering that.I urge other business owners to avoid the hassle and frustration of dealing with an incompetent bank like Qonto. Protect your business and choose a bank that can provide professional and reliable services. Don't let Qonto nearly destroy your business like they did mine!Here are some key takeaways to keep in mind when choosing the right bank for your e-commerce business:Look for a bank that has experience working with e-commerce businesses and understands your unique needs.Choose a bank that has a reliable and efficient payment processing system, so your transactions are processed quickly and accurately.Ensure the bank has proper protocols in place to handle issues such as failed transfers and lost funds. The last thing you want is a bank that cannot locate your funds after they have been transferred.Research the bank's customer service reputation and make sure they are known for providing prompt and helpful responses.Avoid banks with a history of unprofessional behavior and unreliable services. Your business deserves better than that!Don't let an incompetent bank like Qonto nearly destroy your e-commerce business. Choose a bank that can provide the professional and reliable services your business deserves.
reponses: nan

titre_com: Forced to switch from Penta to Qonto, now paying 400% more
commentaire: The Qonto product is good. However, I was a Penta client before and was satisfied as well. Penta was purchased by Qonto and I had to switch over to a new Qonto account. This is our experience: First of all, the administrative tasks of switching a business account are massive: all customers, all suppliers, tax authorities etc. need to change the account. We are still not done with this process and it does cost massive time on our end.Second, at Penta I paid 9 Euros per month. I am now paying 49 Euros to get the same service (Essential plan + X card). There is no additional service/ upside for me. Hence, I recommend all Penta users to search for a less pricy alternative other than Qonto if they also make you switch over.Update 1: I reached out to the email address you described but haven't got a reply. Update 2: DATEV integration does not work two-ways. You cannot send DATEV-created bank payments to Qonto. It simply does not exist. This renders Qonto useless for larger or growing companies in Germany. Stay away.
reponses: Hello Christian,Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I’d love the opportunity to discuss your concerns further in a call.  Unfortunately I could not reach you today.  We want every customer’s experience to be the best possible, and we work hard to make sure that happens. Please feel free to email us at careteam@qonto.com and we will resolve your issue as soon as possible and help with any questions regarding the switch and pricing plan.Thank you for your understanding!Best regardsYour Qonto Team

reponses: Hello, thank you for your feedback.We have tried to reach you by phone to present the joining forces of PENTA with QONTO in details.Regarding your comment, our Smart plan includes more than only just a sub account as an additional service: 1 Mastercard, an accountant access to the account, our Bookkeeping pack, 60 instant SEPA transfers / direct debits + 2 cashed checks, and many advanced features that you can all check on our pricing page: https://qonto.com/en/pricing?select-toggle=soloPlease know that this joining force has the goal to support companies and associations in its daily core business, but also in the growth on the European and German market.The more functional Qonto accounts have been developed as an "all-in-one" finance solution, offering an additional solution for the accounting tasks alongside the bank accounts. Our aim has been to help our customers reduce or even eliminate the cost of additional bookkeeping tool.You can select whichever pricing plan suits your needs and you can also change it whenever you want.If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us by email, chat, or phone.Have a good day.Nina - Care team

commentaire: Very modern and functionally complete banking solution. We're in the process of replacing all other bank accounts with Qonto. We're happy with the features and the support is very quick to help out with questions.The interface and functionality is constantly improving. We're hoping for some minor bugfixes - for instance, if we do collective bank transfers to pay salaries, Qonto can't automatically tag all the indiviual payments with the associated tags per employee, yet.The invoicing feature (brand new) also needs some more functionality, such as entering the "Leistungszeitraum/Lieferdatum, which is a legal requirement in Germany and a series invoice functionality for recurring services such as SaaS.I have high hopes in the Qonto team delivering these things in due time!
reponses: Hello David, Thank you so much for sharing your feedback! 🤩 We’re really happy to count you among our customers. We understand your needs and the team is always working on improvement to facilitate your daily life. 🚀 To make sure your request is well taken into account, we recommend you to write an e-mail at happyclients@qonto.com. We will be pleased to forward it to our German product team. 😉Have a great day.

titre_com: Qonto closed my account without warning…
commentaire: Qonto closed my account without warning while my recall request was being processed.Qonto closed my account without warning or explanation. I had recently requested a recall after money was accidentally transferred to another account. In their statement to me, Qonto stated that they had 10 days to make the recall request. However, once the recall had been made, Qonto later realized with my help that they had not submitted the recall in the correct format. After receiving messages reassuring me that the recall would be sent correctly, Qonto stated that it had been sent in the correct format after 30 days. After I raised the fact that 10 days had expired, I received an email informing me that my account would be closed in 72 hours. Due to this, I have lost over €11,000 in total.
reponses: Hello Temi,First of all, we are sorry to read your comment and that our collaboration has to stop suddenly.We are not authorized to comment publicly your dossier. However, despite the closure of your account, rest assured that we will keep you constantly posted and we are doing our best to facilitate the recall of the funds.As an ACPR-accredited payment institution, we are sometimes required to take some difficult decisions when our client operations or activity do not allow us to meet our legal obligations.We are sorry for the impact this closure may have on your professional activities. We also hope that you have been able to find a structure to welcome you quickly.We remain at your disposal, and we invite you to reach out to the agent that is following your dossier in case you would need any support.Have a nice day.
Hello Vijitharan, 👋We can’t thank you enough for the kind words about our services. If you have any questions or doubts, we’re always here to help you! 😉

titre_com: Closes business account without providing explanation
commentaire: My company had a business account with Qonto. We received our first revenue for our project and Qonto did not like that and decided to close our account without explaining why. Even though we showed the agreements, all material and the invoice, it was not enough for the bank. If you love that a bank can close your business account without giving you any explanation why, this is the bank for you.
reponses: Good morning K I,First of all, we are sorry to read your comment, sorry that our collaboration has to stop suddenly in its early start.As you may have understood, we are not authorized to comment publicly our decisions. However, this closure is based on verified evidence that has forced us to make this decision.As an ACPR-accredited payment institution, we are sometimes required to take some difficult decisions when our client operations or activity do not allow us to meet our legal obligations.We are sorry for the impact this closure may have on your professional activities. We also hope that you have been able to find a structure to welcome you quickly.We remain at your disposal is needed at careteam@qonto.com. Thank you for your understanding.Have a nice day.

commentaire: Since the start of the relationship there was a complete lack of communication, leaving me to contact them constantly for anything to move forward. The whole process and lack of regard for the time of the customer is absurd. It's always you chasing them for information. On top of all that time wasted and frustrations, the end result is that they refuse to accept a legal document as proof of ID thus cancelling my account and not refunding the prepayment of their annual plan. THE WORST EXPERIENCE OVERALL!
reponses: Hello Andres,We read your review very carefully. We are very sorry for this comment. Indeed, we tried to assist you as best we could in the process of opening your account. However, as we have explained on several occasions, the document you provided is not among those accepted by Qonto (information also available on our website) and, for security reasons, we cannot admit any exceptions.  Regarding the refund, as you have already been informed, it has already been made via the stated payment method.  We have tried to contact you again without receiving any reply. If you have any questions, we remain at your disposal.Have a nice day.
Bonjour Hachour hachour, merci pour votre retour positif ​​😍
Grazie Davide! 🙏🏼Facciamo il possibile per offrire servizi che rispondano sempre a tutte le esigenze dei nostri clienti. 😍Sara - Executive Care Team

titre_com: It has now been 4 weeks and Qonto still has done nothing about it!
commentaire: It has now been 4 weeks since our company stoped receiving payments from our customers. Over 50,000 Euro now are somewhere but Qonto doesn’t do anything about it. After promising to compensate our company for all the trouble they are causing us and our customers they had the audacity to charges our monthly subscription!!!! For what? They have done no work to earn the subscription.Can a senior manager please contact me to resolve this very serious issue. Our company can not survive without receiving the payments our customers have sent us.It is Qonto’s fault and no one else.

commentaire: I have a very bad experience with Qonto bank, they scammed me with a transfer of 30.000 Euro which I made in Aug 2021. in the beginning, they were trying to be nice to assist, ask me to provide them with a letter from my bank etc. then, in the end, they never replied to my emails. It's a very bad and horrible feeling to see a bank stealing your money. Avoid this bank it's a scam. The police are working on it now.
reponses: Hi Patrick, we've read you carefully, and have sent you right away an identification request, in order to contact you as soon as possible. We're waiting for your reply, thank you very much!

commentaire: Gives out your private email information to other companies. My third contact with Qonto - a customer service representative calls me. “I saw you have a bad review, I wanted to see if we could help you”I’m amazed. Finally customer service 6 months after I asked for help. “We sent you an email the week following your questions, it’s in your email” I check my email - no evidence in my inbox or spam folder. “Are you sure?” I tell the wonderful customer service rep. “Yes, she says - “let me resend it” Then I get a notification from the Qonto app - the message she I’d sending as an email is showing up as a chat. “Still - no email” I tell her. She gets confused. Eventually she / I understand that when your logged into the app, the customer service messages gets sent as CHAT not EMAIL. We are in 2021 people - and this BANK didn’t know how it’s communicating with clients. I can’t believe that this bank honestly doesn’t teach its wonderful employees about its faulty systems - nor understands the importance of copying at least a ticket response to the contents email and not just sending a reply as a chat when the client can have notifications turned off. On top of this - The bank hired a marketing agency “Sanibel Research” and gave my email info to them to research more about why I didn’t use the bank. I hope it’s obvious - if you can’t get the basic right I won’t trust you with myself money - or my private information
reponses: Hello David,We confirm that we did not hire this company Sanibel Research or provided any private information to them. Regarding the communication tools we apologise for the confusion. Your first message to us was through a chat therefore you receive the response on the chat and not on your email.If you could send us the Sanibel Research email that you received, this will help during the investigation process.Kind regards,

titre_com: Easy to use and quick to set up
reponses: nan

titre_com: Very unreliable. Serious flaws in the organisation
commentaire: On the first look good, but serious flaws. I have had overall a good experience, but a couple of sitatuations that really brought me into critical siuations for my business. Transfers not being processed due to poorly managed AML processes (I worked in a bank myself). Today, after upgrading my phone, I cannot access my account as desktop requires an app pushup confirmation. However, I have a new phone. I was locked in in that app on my new phone, but not receiving these approval requests, but I still had access to my account. So I talked to support on the chat. They told me I would have to delete the app and reinstall them. I asked them if they were 100% sure this will work, and that I would lose access to my account if it didn't. Long story short. It did not work, there is an internal error on their end. They doung f... all to fix it. I have not had access to my account for days. You do not measure a bank how it works on good days. A bank you rely on for your business simply must be always there and reliable. Qonto is far from that. Qonto is not reliable. Do not bank on Qonto.
reponses: Hello David,Thank you very much for your feedback.The current situation regarding the linking of your new phone is of course very unfortunate. We fully understand that this is a big inconvenience for you and your business.In your case, we are working on fixing a specific and serious error in the linking of your new smartphone. Rest assured that our team is working on the case with priority and will contact you very soon with a solution to the problem.In any case, we thank you for your patience so far and for your understanding. Please feel free to contact us at any time if you have any further questions.

titre_com: Qonto is probably the worst account I…
commentaire: Qonto is probably the worst account I have had, I had cancelled a transfer but the bank still sent the payment when it was time to refund me the amount that they accidentally sent. They told me I had to wait up to 15 days. They do not care about the payments I need to make with the money neither did they apologise for the misunderstanding or give me an explanation of why it happened. I also raised a chargeback as the company did not deliver goods that I ordered. I have been told by MasterCard that I should receive a claim number automatically but Qonto insists they do not provide claim numbers. How do I know the claim has been raised? For me personally this is not an account I would recommend to anyone.
reponses: Hi Temi, we've read your feedback with attention.Your claim is currently managed by the dedicated team and we're again, really sorry for its direct impacts. Unfortunately, there are a few regulatory steps and timelines that we cannot influence. This is why we understand your remark and thank you for your patience.We are processing your refund request (which is a chargeback, in your case). As soon as we have some news we will be in touch with you.Best,Qonto

titre_com: Customer service is slow and poorly informed
commentaire: Customer service is slow and not technically proficient. They wasted over a week just to figure out that the 'titre se sejour', my residence permit won't work for them. I have salary setup and an account with another bank in France with it. The lack of experience with something basic is usually a sign of possibly bigger issues down the line so it's good to know early.
reponses: Hi Vishal, we've read your feedback very carefully and we truly want to inform you.As a payment institution approved by the French Prudential Supervision and Resolution Authority, we carry out rigorous checks on given documents by our future customers when they open an account.Documents validations are therefore essential to ensure a trustworthy business relationship, which will be in full compliance with our account validation guidelines.As far as the refusal to enter into a relationship for non-compliant documents is concerned, this is subject to internal guidelines, which may of course seem to you to be subject to exceptions. We provide all these information on this dedicated page, which I invite you to consult: https://support.qonto.eu/hc/en-us/articles/360001133218-What-kind-of-identity-documents-are-accepted-by-Qonto-
nan

commentaire: All was great until...One day I decided to refund one of my clients who lives in Turkey, as it is not possible to send money there, I just decided to send them to her sister who lives in the UK (SEPA bank area), which I did before with the other bank and the transfer usually arrived next day, but not this time. Check out the time line:April 8 bank transfer, one week no news...April 14 I receive an email in French, which I don’t know (my account was open in Italy) and I just dismissNext days I start to call and they tell me that the bank called me April 14 and couldn’t reach, so they just sent me a message (in French?!)April 21 I receive a message asking details for the transfer, I answer two days after and again nothing... no answer no explanation April 29 I call again, they check, no answerMay 6th they send me a message asking exact same details they asked on April 21 (really?), probably they lost the message or whateverSame day I answer once again, same thingsAfter couple of hours I decide just to cancel the transfer...I text the bank that I want to cancel it in the end, they confirm, I asked also if the commissions (~25€) will be refunded as well and I receive a negative answer, they didn’t transfer the money, but kept commissions, great client serve!May 13 I finally have the money back (after more than one month), transfer all the funds, close my account.I hope that you won’t have same problem with this bank and will find my story useful for you!
reponses: Hi Vitali, we've read your very complete feedback with attention and we truly want to have a phone conversation with you, next week, in order to react to your message, and inform you!Are you available for a phone conversation, next week?Please let us know when you're available, on our dedicated email address : feedback@qonto.euThank you very much, and have a nice weekend!

commentaire: +veGreat support, very reactive, multi-lingual.Web interface works well on most platforms.Tools are handy, such as adding extra notes and attachments to a payment.Ability to set card limits with immediate effect is SO much better than classic French banks.It's built in and for this era, rather than the old school grating system with an adaptation for 'online banking', if we must, attitude.-veLack of support for LCR type payments is a big negative for a business bank. Frustrates supplier relations, some suppliers just won't allow business credit accounts without it.

titre_com: I would not recommend Orange Bank
commentaire: I would not recommend Orange Bank. Currently I am trying to transfer some funds from my account to another bank. They take the money from your account but do not transfer it. Then, 4 days later, they send an email telling you the transfer needs validating. However there is no way to validate the transfer in the application. So you have to ask the AI for help, who eventually connects you with a service advisor. I was connected to 'Sarah Conseiller 76' who was unable to help, and told me I have to wait another 48 hours to speak with an advisor who can validate the payment. When I questioned why, she ended the conversation by disconnecting me. A highly questionable way to deal with customers.
reponses: Bonjour Mike, Nous sommes sincèrement navrés d'apprendre que le conseiller en charge de votre demande n'ait pas pu répondre à vos attentes.Vous pouvez prendre contact avec nous par e-mail : webmaster@orangebank.fr.En vous souhaitant une belle journée,Emma
nan

reponses: Bonjour Bernadette, Nous comprenons parfaitement votre déception.En effet la nouvelle mise à jour de notre application, n'est possible que sur les mobiles avec le système Android 7.0 ou une version plus récente.Les versions inférieures ne permettent plus un niveau de service suffisant pour que l'application fonctionne de manière optimale.Malheureusement pour vous, c'est la raison pour laquelle les clients détenteurs d'une version inférieure n'ont donc plus accès à l'application.A bientôt,Sara

commentaire: When I went to the branch to open my account , they did not give any consultation but go straight to register me in their system. Third mistake, she intentionally set Orange bank as my principal bank even though I did not ask for that !? After all these have been solved, there hasn’t been any further problems. Anyway, always be careful with them !

She has a UK card, which was refused 3 times.  I tried to pay and again, refused.  She was blamed for the refusal, even though it was all approved our end. So I'm guessing money from a UK account isn't acceptable for Orange. Now she needs to open an account very quickly and look elsewhere.  What a waste of time. Terrible service.

titre_com: I chose Orange Bank because they were free
commentaire: I chose Orange Bank because they were freeNow I cannot make any withdrawal or payment because I HAVE NO CARD!This happened with the switch to Mastercard.Everything was ok with VISA, except not being a "real" bank I often cannot pay at certain places - it is a "charge" card.But they did not send the new Mastercard to my old address. I updated my address via the App, and orderd another card for 10 €.It has been 3 weeks, and STILL NO CARD!I have tried for help via the only chat and just go round in circles! I raise support requests via the App and they get closed with no action!So for that I AM LEAVING ORANGE BANK for AXA BANK.
reponses: Bonjour Jon Jeremy,Je vous remercie de votre avis et je suis désolé de ces événements.Pour information, pendant le changement de partenaire bancaire (Visa vers Mastercard) nous avons automatiquement envoyé la nouvelle carte à l'adresse renseignée sur votre compte bancaire.Si votre nom/prénom n'étaient pas affichés sur la boîte aux lettres ou si vous avez déménagé sans nous signaler votre nouvelle adresse : la carte ne peut pas être livrée.Bonne journée,Tom.

titre_com: Terrible in virtually every way (yes as…
commentaire: Terrible in virtually every way (yes as people say they have a nice looking app), which will not help when it comes to the inevitable issues. Very low withdrawal limits which can not be raised (they say in reply below that they can - but the requests are denied for no reason with no explanation and no way to change it, very low limits, imagine being outside France and this being your only source of money if something went wrong, no way to call to increase the limit, even in France there are no branches so no way round this). Impossible security. No way to contact them (except sending 500 max character messages for very urgent matters that get automatic refusal responses days later). Instant chat customer service can not actually do anything and are extremely rude and short with you, actually cutting-off conversations mid way. Constant glitches and app/website issues, often can't complete a simple procedure for many days (and of course there is no branch to go to or way to phone them). No way to use it on a computer without your phone. If you can not walk into the bank - you need better than this to rely on for your main account. Can't imagine anyone risking this as their main or only account, you know for sure at some point things will go terribly wrong. If you plan on using it as a backup account for some simple things it might be ok, I would never trust them for anything significant. The online idea is a good one, but they totally missed the target with this, it can only survive here because the competition is so terrible and expensive in France.
reponses: Bonjour Josh Casey,Nous sommes désolés pour ce retour d’expérience, qui, à priori ne vous a pas satisfait. En effet, notre application peut être touchée par des dysfonctionnements, qui sont en général résolus dans la journée. Effectivement, nos cartes ont des plafonds de paiement et de retrait selon l'offre choisie. Il est possible de faire une demande d'augmentation de ces plafonds. Vous restez Maître de vos demandes et de votre application.Pour ce qui concerne le fait que nous ne sommes joignables, il fait suite à la crise sanitaire, nous avons dû réorganiser notre service et notre ligne est dédiée à nos clients Premium.Nous vous invitons, à nous contacter sur webmaster@orangebank.fr nous pourrons vous assister dans vos demandes.Bonne journée.L'équipe Orange Bank.

commentaire: Nearly 2 years to respond. You must have had to find false answers to a lot of complaints !!Voted best online bank. How? 15 working days to clear a cheque. Charge for replacement cards when they promise 1 free per year. Show services available at boutique (lies). Charges taken from account with no explanation & no chance of a refund
reponses: Bonjour Gary,Nous ne promettons pas de remplacement de carte gratuite par an, n'hésitez pas à me donner plus d'informations sur information@contact.orangebank.frBonne journée,Tom.

commentaire: My advice is DO NOT open an account. Once they have your money you find it virtually impossible to get it back.I have sent several letters by post & over 50 e-mails over the last month trying to close my account without reply.DO NOT RISK IT !!Il a fallu plus de 2 semaines pour créditer un chèque sur mon compte, vous m'avez donc facturé pour fonds insuffisants sur mon compte.4 jours pour créditer un virement bancaire pour remédier au problème.M'a facturé pour l'utilisation d'un distributeur automatique de billets.Ces prestations prennent au maximum 2 heures sans frais au Crédit Agricole.
reponses: Bonjour Gary,Je tiens à m'excuser des difficultés que vous avez rencontrées.Sachez que nous ne bloquons pas de sommes sans justification, en fonction de la situation les délais peuvent être plus conséquents.Belle journée,Tom.

reponses: Bonjour Carole,Je suis désolé que vous ayez eu des difficultés dans l'utilisation de votre compte Orange Bank,Sachez que nous avons amélioré nos services au fil du temps pour atteindre une qualité de service reconnue (notamment le trophée Moneyvox de la meilleure application bancaire de 2022 https://www.orangebank.fr/blog/banque-en-ligne/trophee-moneyvox-2022-de-la-meilleure-application-bancaire-pour-orange-bank)Bonne journée,Tom.

titre_com: Random Close your account and steal your money
commentaire: They random close my account with the motive "Start of a routine check"... I had a recive a transfer of 299€ at the same day and I didnt withdraw the money. Email them and got this reply:"Hello,We have received your request concerning a Lydia account that has already been closed by our teams.However, we will not be able to proceed.There is also no need to contact us again or via another channel on this subject.Thank you for your understanding.Kind regards,"I am asking about the 299€ for the last three days and no one reply to me or return my money.Scam bank that will steal your money. Dont trust them!
reponses: nan

titre_com: Horrible bank for doing transactions to other banks
commentaire: Whenever I do a bank transfer they ask me for more info:"As part of our compliance checks, we have had to temporarily block this IBAN "******************" until we have verified the identity of the beneficiary. In order to be able to unblock the situation, I would ask you to send me a PDF version of the RIB, and to tell me whether this account belongs to you, or to give me the first and last name of the holder of this IBAN as well as his or her date of birth, if the account belongs to an individual. For your information, RIB means ‘Relevé d'Identité Bancaire’ in French. It is a document issued by the bank holding the account. It is the account's identity document.This document includes: the name of the account holder, the name of the bank, the IBAN of the account and the BIC code. We advise you to record the IBANs with the full names of the holders to avoid this situation again."How insane is this. That means I would need to contact the recipient and they need to provide me a document. SO weird and unusual.
reponses: nan

titre_com: hi bad experience with sumeria I had…
commentaire: I had a bad experience with the online bank Lydia, which I really liked, but it was replaced by Sumeria Bank. Unfortunately, my experience with the latter was very disappointing. Here's what happened:I received a notification informing me that I needed to fund my account for upcoming direct debits, which I did immediately. The next morning, when I checked if the direct debits had gone through, I discovered that Sumeria Bank had charged fees on the money I had deposited. These fees were supposedly due to unpaid direct debits.This experience was very negative for me. When I complained to customer service, a representative confirmed that the fees for unpaid direct debits could not be waived. He also explained that the bank had the right to charge operational fees to its customers.

titre_com: Refusing to return balance after wrongly closing account
commentaire: This is a horrible bank.They opened my account without problems. I needed a European Bank account as I was moving from Asia to Europe.When I made 3 transfers to my own bank account for a total of around €16k, they asked for source of funds. Fair enough, I provided them the paperwork.Then they wanted a copy of a bank statement for the last 3 months of my Bank in Asia. Fine, here you go, even digitally signed by my bank.Next thing I knew, I couldnt login anymore. They closed my account. No email, nothing.When emailing them it appeared they didn't understand the Asian paperwork.The undertone I got from some of the employees (Samira & Viginie), made me feel like I was some sort of criminal and they had no intention of helping me.After all this I didn't even want an account with them anymore, but I wanted my balance back.I don't want to have discussions with a bank, I want a bank that treats me as a customer. I sent them the account details of my bank in Asia. The Bank where the funds originated from.While they accept SWIFT payments to their accounts, they will not send payments back on the SWIFT system.They informed me that until I provide them with a European account, they are holding my funds. An account that has to be transferred to with the SWIFT system is not capible with Lydia. This seems like the world upside down to me, but fine, I will involve (a) lawyer(s) now to get my balace and maybe expenses made. Not really what you want when opening a simple bank account, but be prepared for it if you start doing business with Lydia..7 November 2023 A quick update. Since I have posted on this medium, what I have let them know to be completely transparent, they have not responded to any of my emails. I have emailed them every day so far and even tried to make life easier for them offering them the opportunity to do a SEPA transfer to return funds, as they requested.Since they do not pick up any phone calls on their number +33179754030, the only form of communication I have is email.It seems to me they are trying their best to stall the situation, until I give up so they can keep the funds.I will keep updating this post, also if it ends positively, but so far it isn't looking good.16 November 2023Last week I have again emailed Lydia to inform them I have approached legal representation in Paris and am waiting for them to advice me.I have also let them know what legal firm I will be using.Again no response whatsoever.I was under the impression that the email was ignored again, but to my surprise I got a phonecall from the bank that I used to send funds to my Lydia account from (not Lydia).The transactions I had done have been reversed and will be back on that account soon (will update).I explained the situation to the other bank and they were absolutely discusted. The impression I now have from the company Lydia-app is that they have no problem violating your rights as a customer, holding your funds as long as they can, but quickly bend down and return them as soon as they have to deal with qualified legal representatives.Not the best impression to leave and if anyone would asks my opinion prior to opening an account with Lydia, I would advice strongly against it.An email with apology from Lydia to me should be send, but chances are low as then they would have to admit wrong doing. If by some miracle this does happen, I will also be fair and publish this here.For a financial institution, hiding under the blanket is not a pretty sight.24 November 2023After a tiring time consuming fight Lydia has returned my funds and I have now received them.The conclusion is that Lydia refuses to send them back in a normal way, but when the process of hiring a lawyer is started, they suddenly give ot back.BE AWARE! Do not use this bank!
