titre_com: Decent app: great ideas, poor user interface design
commentaire: Lydia is a good app with interesting features. It’s innovating as it’s definitely breaking with traditional way of banking. It provides a crucial feature, instant peer to peer payment. Unfortunately, it’s 2022 and instant peer to peer payment is no longer something revolutionary. Lydia’s major weakness is a very poor app design, that is totally overlooking user experience. Using Lydia ( the latest update didn’t improve this issue at all) is super annoying, the interface is so confusing. Nothing is made simple or intuitive. They should urgently upgrade their user interface design standards or they will keep losing users, me included. Would be a shame since it’s a promising French tech app at the forefront, I want them to expand, but they must tackle user interface more seriously.

titre_com: I had to try accounts from 3 different EU countries before I could transfer my money
commentaire: I signed up to this app on the insistence of a French client so she could pay me (I'm not based in France). It was a pain in the a** to transfer my money. They claim you can transfer money to any EU or UK account, so I tried 2 EU accounts (Revolut - Lithuania and ING Austria - and neither went through). I couldn't even find ING Spain on the list of banks (they seem to mainly list French banks and some in other French-speaking countries). Finally I was able to send money to myself via text and use my Spanish IBAN to collect it. Thank god I have bank accounts in three different EU countries to choose from, otherwise I wouldn't have been able to get my money. Incidentally, UK bank accounts do not have IBANs, so I don't see how you could actually transfer money to a UK account (as they claim you can) given that they don't provide the option to insert an account number + sort code (which all UK accounts use). Save yourself the trouble and use revolut or transferwise instead.
reponses: nan

titre_com: Terrible experience, don't use for big events!
commentaire: Used Lydia for a large event. Their interface is appalling compared to Fixr or Q-pay. It is very difficult to use, even for tech-savvy people. We ended up making our own spreadsheets. Their helpline was slow and often flat-out did not reply to us. It doubly charged a lot of people, so we had to give refunds, incurring the booking fee. They forgot to pay us for some of our transactions. They promised benefits such as £1 per new customer but have still not paid us the cashback - it's been over 4 months, meaning there was literally no benefit in using them over others. Save yourself the aggravation and don't use!
reponses: We are sorry if you had a bad experience with Lydia Pro. In order to help you, can you write to supportpro@lydia-app.com ?

commentaire: A useful payment service when you don't have a problem, but the moment you start having problems it's a NIGHTMARE !!!I've been a strong advocate of Lydia during the past 1+ years until I realized I've landed my foot in the "merde". They never listen to their customers. Terribly disappointing service. They don't have a direct channel through which you can contact in case of emergency. They never reply to emails, only until I Tweeted them. They first kindly ask me for my phone number and e-mail, as if they are going to go through my requests. But of course, they have never read my previous requests and I have to explain my problem again. Their answers are not at all sufficient and do not address the problem I'm going through. Each time, they come back with new support personnel, making me explain my situation once again. I've wasted the last two weeks and still my problem not solved. I have 450€ blocked in my Lydia wedding cagnotte, I still have no clue whether I can withdraw this money, if yes, how... Or at least, if I cannot withdraw this money, what will happen to this money ??  In the meantime, they've been sending me a couple of promotional marketing emails. Is this a JOKE ?? I've told them multiple times that I need to withdraw the money asap because the wedding is in only one week. ONLY HAD THEY SPENT AS MUCH TIME ON CUSTOMER SERVICE AS THEY DO ON MARKETING EFFORTS...  No wonder why you have so small number of users and 2,5 rating on Trustpilot. Next time if you ever organize a cagnotte, I recommend using Leetchi and reimbursing your friends use Revolut or N26. At least they have a reliable customer service. COMPLETELY USELESS. Lydia should simply stay as a reimbursement service between friends. You are mistaken if you think you have found your perfect Neobank, because Lydia is not and never will be.
reponses: nan

commentaire: This is ridiculous service ,  i have opened my business account with anytym , used it for more than 1 year , and suddenly they suspended my account for no reason at all . Also they have kept my 5000 euro blocked in that account .I have sent them msg to contact me and to solve my problem , Its been , 3 month , they are telling me only to wait . reponses: Hi Sayed, We are sorry for your negative experience with Anytime. We regret that our services do not meet your needs.We confirm that we have closed your account in accordance with your request.We certainly cannot erase what happened, but we take these kinds of cases very seriously. Therefore our aim is to make sure that something like this won't happen anymore.We wish you all the best for the future.Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards, Barbara - Anytime

titre_com: The worst bank I have ever worked with
commentaire: The worst bank I have ever worked with.  They are unreachable. They allow you to sign up for appointments and then they don’t honor them (3 in a row for us), don’t answer emails, don’t respond by telephone, don’t permit you to make transfers, and are blocking our nearly 8000 euros. This is not a business bank. It’s clearly a scam.
reponses: Hi, Thank you for your feedback, although it is negative. We are deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, your package does not give you access to our telephone line. This is why our internal messaging service is available to answer all your questions.If you wish to have access to our customer service on the phone, we invite you to subscribe to the EASY package. Here is a comparison of our rates: https://www.anyti.me/fr/tarifs/. We remain at your disposal,Barbara - Anytime

titre_com: Everything was great until you sign up
commentaire: I initially gave a good review to anytime as they were great when we set up the account, which is for a new association. Our association raises money for people with rare diseases in Ukraine impacted by the war.  Now that it's time to send the money to the beneficiaries, we're told that you can only make transfers to SEPA countries with an IBAN number. Even countries outside of SEPA who have affiliated banks in the EU are no good because anytime won't let you make transfers using Swift anymore.  Since joining they have also completely disabled features to get or send cheques. (This may seem like not a big deal, until someone wants to make you a donation).  When you ask for help you get annoying AI generated responses inviting you to 'find another solution' but 'rest assured, you can still make a transfer via iban in SEPA.'  This account is very expensive for what it is. It's basically a scam. They understood where and how I wanted to send transfers when i set up the account and now there is literally nothing I can do except send the money to my personal account-so what's the point. Traditional French banks are slower and they don't like to open small association accounts so they will try to put you off, but honestly it's worth the hassle because this 'bank' really is not fit for purpose.
reponses: Hi Michael, We appreciate your initial positive review and we're truly sorry to hear about your recent experiences with our services. We understand the importance of the work your association is doing to support those affected by rare diseases in Ukraine during these challenging times, and we apologize for any inconvenience you've encountered.Our goal is to provide a reliable and efficient banking experience, and it's disheartening to hear that we've fallen short of your expectations. We understand that you've encountered difficulties with international transfers outside the SEPA region. We acknowledge that this limitation can be frustrating, and we're actively exploring ways to expand our international transfer options to better serve our diverse customer base.We apologize for the inconvenience you've faced with the disabled cheque features. While cheques have become less common in today's digital banking landscape, we recognize that they still hold value in certain situations. We will review the possibility of reinstating this feature or providing an alternative solution.Thank you for bringing these issues to our attention, and we hope to have the opportunity to regain your trust in the future.Sincerely, Barbara - Anytime
Bonjour 😁, Merci d'avoir pris le temps de partager votre avis sur Trustpilot ! A très vite, Margaux - Anytime 🫶

titre_com: I have been waiting for money to be…
commentaire: I have been waiting for money to be transfert 5 days already and now , they are telling me that my bank info have to be in pdf if not they can t process , what a scam ,it suppose to be business banking and it s the worse bank ever , can t wait to close that account .
reponses: Hi Aicha, We are sorry to read your disappointment. First of all, we would like to remind you that Anytime is subject to regulatory obligations that require us to perform regular and random checks on transactions.We apologise if this request seems intrusive. Please note that as a banking institution, Anytime is legally obliged to monitor transactions in the same way as a traditional bank. Therefore, we may ask you to provide proof of the origin of funds received into your account or proof of a transaction leaving your account.We note that you have provided the requested proof on your Customer Area, and confirm that your file is being processed by the department in charge. Kind regards, Barbara - Anytime

titre_com: Don't touch with a barge pole!
commentaire: Don't touch with a barge pole!It makes me doubt the veracity of the reviews here, had an account with them for 6 moths and it has been nothing but problems but it sort of worked with work-arounds. In September they suspended international payments, supposedly for the moth September, they are still suspended today 04/November/2021... And to brighten up my day, it seems to me all payments are now suspended, even within France as nothing goes out and transactions just evaporate from the system. And the customer service? As if it wasn't there... no answers, nothing...So, tell me this, how can a bank that has got all transfers suspended and doesn't answer help line get 4.5 stars???

titre_com: This was one of the most bizarre…
commentaire: This was one of the most bizarre experiences I've ever had - and with a bitter surprise at the end. The process of setting up the account is strangely quite long and complicated, it's done in three phases and takes a few days (a week?). The last stage is an interview on the phone with somebody who is very nosy and basically wants to know where your money is...But the cherry on top is cashing a chèque - it takes, please do sit down - 5 weeks! First I thought I'm reading it wrong and its 5 days but no, 5 bloody weeks. No way I'm staying. I read the terms and conditions before I started filling up the application forms and I read them again today, there is, obviously, no mention of this in the T&Cs, only when you first long on that they drop it on you. Neat. Plus the website keeps freezing, strange, very strange outfit.
reponses: Bonjour, Merci d'avoir pris le temps de partager votre expérience même si celle-ci est négative. Après vérification, je constate que l'ouverture de votre compte Anytime a été réalisée en 4 jours. Nous aurions pu ouvrir le compte plus rapidement, seulement comme indiqué dans le premier échange avec nos services nous demandons que la vérification de votre identité par caméra soit effectuée. Celle-ci ayant été réalisée le 26 mai, nous avons pu procéder à l'ouverture de votre compte le jour même 😊De plus, afin d'être certains de correspondre à vos besoins, nous prenons toujours contact avec nos clients lors de leur souscription. Durant cet échange, nous nous informons sur votre activité et donnons toutes les informations nécessaires au sujet de la gestion de votre compte. Concernant les chèques, le délai d'encaissement est effectivement de 5 semaines en moyenne, à réception de votre courrier à notre centre de traitement. Si ce délai peut paraître un peu long, il est néanmoins nécessaire pour nous de s'assurer que votre chèque soit bien en règle, c'est-à-dire bien provisionné et non déclaré perdu ou volé. Nous avons l'obligation de vérifier la validité du chèque auprès de tous les acteurs impliqués dans cette opération. Cette procédure permet d'éviter des frais de rejet importants pour vous mais aussi pour Anytime. Si nous ne faisons pas cela, que peut-il se passer ? Prenons l'exemple d'une situation où nous créditerions immédiatement votre chèque de 4.000€ dès sa réception. Vous dépensez cet argent dans la foulée.La banque de votre client le rejette tardivement, c'est-à-dire à la toute fin du délai de contestation de 11 jours. Anytime doit rendre à la banque le montant de 4.000€. De votre côté, vous n'avez plus l'argent sur votre compte et nous devons donc mettre en place une procédure administrative pour récupérer les fonds. Cette situation litigieuse, et ce malgré votre bonne foi, serait aussi désagréable pour vous que pour nous.Si ce délai ne convient pas à votre activité, ce que nous comprenons tout à fait, nous vous recommandons de privilégier les encaissements par carte bancaire via un lien de paiement (lien) ou par virements, afin de vous faire régler plus facilement et plus rapidement par vos clients.N'hésitez pas à nous contacter sur promisonrepond@anyti.me pour toutes vos questions, nous sommes à votre écoute. A très bientôt, Léa
Bonjour, Merci pour cet avis positif ! Nous sommes heureux de voir que vous avez eu une expérience 5 étoiles 🤩Bon weekend, Barbara - Anytime

reponses: Bonjour, Nous sommes navrés pour l'expérience négative que vous avez vécue avec Anytime. Nous avons essayé de vous joindre par téléphone en date du 23/09/2022 afin de discuter avec vous l'ouverture de votre deuxième compte sans succès. Nous avons, donc, envoyé un lien pour prendre rendez-vous à la date et heure que vous préférez. Nous vous prions de prendre rendez-vous avec nos collègues afin de procéder avec l'ouverture de votre deuxième compte. Merci de votre collaboration, Barbara - Anytime

Hi, We're sorry to hear that. Please be aware that Anytime is subject to regulatory requirements ⚖️ and our Compliance team must follow certain processes to ensure the safety of all our users.In fact, upon investigation, our team may block or close an account, without notice, in accordance with Article 6 of our TOS.In addition, we work with various partners and some of them may ask us to close accounts, in order to comply with the banking regulations in force, and this in accordance with the various framework contracts which bind you.Finally, we are registered with the ACPR in France and the BNB in Belgium, so we are obliged to follow the measures imposed by these state bodies.I know this is frustrating for you. Like every day, the reminder has already been made, we are waiting for a return after review of your file by our Compliance Department. Everything is being done on our side to ensure that you have full access to your account again.Your account is currently being treated by our client service. We will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding. Kind regards, Barbara - Anytime

Bonjour, Nous sommes désoles, mais comme dans n'importe quel compte ou banque en ligne, aucune opération ne peut être validée pendant les weekends ni les jours fériés.Après vérification, vos virements ont bien été exécutés en date du 20/12.Nous vous invitons à prendre connaissance de votre relevé de compte. titre_com: Probably the worst bank I have ever used.
commentaire: Honestly one of the worst banks ive ever dealt with. You log onto the website it says it has failed and the IT service are looking at it. It's been like this for months. You complete the capital deposit with them, which is actually a very good service, and in order to complete this deposit you have to sign up to the pro account. Once the account is set up you go onto the platform and have none of the pro features and they give you an option to pre-order the pro function. You call up the number they give you and it tells you to contact them through the site. It takes 3 days to hear anything back. Tried to make a transfer. Did not even recognise any of the 4 french IBAN I used. Tried to contact them but customer service is literally non-existent. I would recommend for the capital deposit but stay away from them if you are thinking of using them for banking.*Update since review* Anytime are quicker at getting back to you on trust pilot then they are on there own platform. If you want customer service just write a bad review, they will get back to you in a day. Since the review has been written they will not let me transfer money out of my account to close it. It sat pending for a week. When I asked them why it had not been sent they told me they didn't know. They called me back and told me the transfer would happen that day. The next day they email saying the transfer has been cancelled and to do it again. I did it again and I still havent had the transfer executed. They also tried to send me the card about 3 weeks after I had opened a pro account with them which failed even though a competitor bank sent me a brand new card next day to the same address. They claim they fixed the site. Issue is still blatantly there. Only when I write a bad review on trustpilot do they then provide me with the pro features that I paid for. Admission of guilt on their behalf. Tried to ask for a refund given that they had not given me the pro features, have not heard anything back in days. I just want do be done with anytime so I never have to have this experience as well but they wont let me leave. Last thing my accountant in France told me not to use anytime so clearly they don't have a good reputation. Be very careful about using them.
reponses: Bonjour, Merci d'avoir pris le temps de partager votre expérience même si celle-ci est négative. Je suis navrée de la situation rencontrée avec nos services. Nous vous confirmons avoir fait le nécessaire au sujet des différents points énoncés. Merci pour votre compréhension et votre confiance. A très bientôt, Léa

commentaire: I have been trying to hold off writing a review in this way, but my patience has run out.I set up an account with Anytime for my new French company. The aim, to buy a chalet and run it part as second home and part as business. The Anytime account was set up very quickly and efficiently. Obviously it would be, to get you on board.The first transaction was to be the property transaction, so I tested the account to ensure I could transfer funds in. I received my banking card. All looked good, efficient.I sent a message to the bank to inform them of the transaction and that they would be receiving 700,000 Euros, which I would then need to use to complete the transaction and develop the property. 30 hours later I get a message to say I can only send 10,000 Euros to the account, which can't have more than 50,000 in it. Too late, 30 hours is a long time and the funds have been transferred. This credit and transfer limit is a very material term. I still cannot see the terms and conditions that state it.8 days later, I still do not have the 700,000 Euros back, how crazy is that. The day for completion of the purchase has passed earlier this week. Signing has happened, but I have let the Sellers down. I have no way to access the funds, they are in the system.I keep asking for progress and providing all information requested. I may ask 5 to 10 questions in messages in a day. 48 hours at the earliest I get a reply to one question. The rest of the questions go unanswered. The Bank is faceless and you never get the same person answering messages. There is no conversation. You can't call.Banks have a duty of care to their customers. Duties around client monies are pretty high. These duties are simply not being respected at all.The Bank are saying that they are seeking to increase the credit and transfer limit. They know the urgency, but it has taken 6 days and still documents uploaded have not been looked at. When I ask if they can find the funds, they say it will be at least 7 days, but provide no rationale for this and no information on the funds. They have the transfer certificates, so they know they received it.This bank is set up for every day business. Anything not in the everyday mundane transactions will not work. They are unable to deal with specific requests, whether in chat, messages or on the telephone. They need to rework the model as all businesses have some extraordinary transactions.A faceless bank that shirks its responsibilities and hides behind the answers the internal systems give it.I hope they may right this and then prove me wrong, but I would be foolish to hold my breath.

reponses: Bonjour Simon, Merci d'avoir pris le temps de partager votre avis même si celui-ci est négatif 🙏Chez Anytime, nous proposons 4 offres différentes avec chacune leurs spécificités. L'offre Solo à laquelle vous souscrivez vous permet de joindre nos services par message. Nous répondons à vos demandes dans un délai de 24 à 48H ouvrées.Cependant je comprends parfaitement votre mécontentement. En effet, ces délais peuvent paraître longs surtout si votre requête est urgente. Si votre demande ne peut attendre, nous avons la chance de disposer d'un service de Chat vous permettant de communiquer avec Brigitte du lundi au vendredi de 10H à 17H. Comme indiqué par téléphone, notre priorité est votre satisfaction. Nous vous promettons donc de tout mettre en oeuvre afin que nos services soient à la hauteur de vos attentes. Prenez soin de vous, Léa 🦋

This review relates to French version of the website. I shall be moving my account elsewhere.Thanks for the reply, shame you weren't a bit quicker dealing with my problems! I will still be closing my account. Just an update, since I first reviewed this disaster of a bank, they have failed to pay my social security contributions to URSSAF for the month of August, even though there was more than enough in the account to cover it. Customer service is a joke, not even worthy of the name.I will soon be moving my account to Crédit Agricole.

titre_com: One week to reply to a question,then a…
commentaire: One week to reply to a question,then a one word answer really not helpful.Still waiting for my next question to be answered and i have an account with them.If you are in england dont expect to pay your french bills with this account.(Update) i cant reply to your message below mine so i find it funny how you claim to not use trustpilot but you answered on here quicker than my question on your customer portal i,m still waiting for my answer i am an active account holder shall i screen shot your one worded answer to my first question on your customer portel?Ridicule le service client est vraiment mauvais, je les ai signalés
reponses: **CECI EST UN MESSAGE AUTOMATIQUE** Bonjour,Le commentaire que vous avez posté concerne une demande pour le Service Client.Pour obtenir une réponse rapide à votre problématique, nous vous invitons à vous connecter à votre Espace Client et à signaler votre problème. Notre équipe mettra alors tout en œuvre pour vous apporter une solution efficace rapidement.Si vous l’avez déjà signalé, le fait de passer par Trustpilot ne permettra malheureusement pas d’accélérer le processus. En effet, notre Service Client n’a plus connaissance des commentaires Trustpilot. Nous avons pris la décision de ne plus utiliser Trustpilot, de nous recentrer sur l’expérience de nos clients et donc sur leurs messages reçus via l’Espace Client et ce, pour plusieurs raisons :1/ 58,4% des commentaires négatifs postés concernent des comptes clôturés / en cours de clôture ou sont initiés par des personnes malveillantes. 2/ 95,3% des messages négatifs sont postés par des personnes pour lesquelles l’utilisation d’une néo banque est compliquée, le service n’étant pas adapté. Ils s’attendent à avoir un conseiller disponible par téléphone 24h/24h et ne sont pas à l’aise avec le « 100% digital ». 3/ 98,2% des messages négatifs, décrivent un problème qui aurait pu être évité si les utilisateurs avaient lu nos messages, nos FAQ et nos instructions.Tous ces types de messages induisent alors en erreur les internautes qui pourraient lire ces commentaires.Nous avons également décidé de mettre en place un système de notation, afin de nous permettre d’améliorer notre Service Client. En effet, lorsque nos clients se connectent à leur espace, ils ont alors la possibilité de nous noter. Notre note est aujourd’hui de 9,2/10 (vs 7,6/10 sur Trustpilot).  Une mauvaise note sur notre système est beaucoup plus alertant pour nous que sur Trustpilot.

titre_com: bonsoir peut on deposer un capital pour …
commentaire: bonsoir peut on deposer un capital pour une ceation de societe en france? merci
reponses: Bonsoir,Oui, nous allons vous délivrer une attestation de dépôt de capital qui vous permettra ensuite d'obtenir votre Kbis. Lors de l'ouverture de votre compte, vous devrez choisir l'option "je veux créer ma société". Ensuite vous devrez compléter une formulaire et nous fournir des documents d'identités. Une fois les documents vérifiés, nous vous communiquerons l'IBAN du notaire sur lesquels les associés devront effectuer les virements. Le notaire rédigera l'attestation de dépôt de capital.

titre_com: The worst bank i ever came across after…
commentaire: The worst bank i ever came across after HSBC. The customer service is helpless and rude. They do not understand that if you are blocked out of your account, you cannot send them an email ! You cant call them from abroad or it takes forever and when you do reach them they give you a lecture about sending them an email ! i say i cant and they say. Well you need to pretend you are not a client to email us if your account is blocked !? What??? They also block my account so often that i had no time to manage my funds in 12 months ! each time i am blocked. In the meantime i moved country, called them and they told me to unblock you need your phone updated. I said i am talking to you now and they said - no you need to pretend you are not a client to email us to do the change. WHATTTTTT? I did that and received an email threatening them to close the account. They responded with a letter called"closure of account'' giving me 30days to remove my funds to which they didnt sort out my access to !? they are crazy ! I never saw something like this. They then asked me to write a letter and sign and send them by email to ask to change the phone number ! This is the worst Bank on the planet, do not waste your time as i did please find another as i will and if you know another good one, tell me. These people are out of this world !
reponses: nan

titre_com: faille de securite sur transaction cb
reponses: Bonjour Daniel,Nous accordons une grande importance à la sécurité de nos transactions par carte bancaire et nous regrettons d'apprendre que vous avez constaté une faille de sécurité. La protection de vos données et la prévention de la fraude sont des priorités pour nous. Votre avis est important pour nous car il nous aide à améliorer constamment nos services. Pour nous permettre de mieux vous répondre nous vous invitons à formuler une réclamation par e-mail en utilisant le formulaire disponible sur vôtre « Accès Client », rubrique « Nous contacter ». Sélectionnez le motif "Formuler une réclamation".Cordialement,L'Équipe Fortuneo.

commentaire: Worst bank Ever.I just opened a bank account with them. needed to transfert money. Here where it get funny, I transfert money from the aps. Wait 2 days, no update. I then receive an email asking me to justify.Okay fair enough ... I reply ... Two days, still no answer .. I decide to call customer service. They ask me the exact same question and tell me that it will be validated within 48 hours .. 48 hours later, I receive a call where the person asking me what I intend to do with the money (wait for real).I reply that christmas is coming, im thinking of buying a car or a camera (we're talking abt 3K€).She said ok, this will be solved. Next day I receive an email asking me the exact same thing but ask me to join an invoice as a proof that im gonna buy a car (for real?).We're talking about same owner, two different banks, moving money from fortuneo to a different bank.So as crazy this may sound, I comply, send them proof. Then I call them, While I am writing this review, i am on the phone from the past 37minutes and I already explain the situation to 4 differents person and STILL not solved ... This is the worst experience EVER ...

titre_com: E un up intelligence e bellissima ma…
commentaire: E un up intelligence e bellissima ma cara
reponses: Buongiorno Mara, Grazie per la tua recensione, Proponiamo tre piani a seconda delle esigenze: il piano Light a 2,99€ al mese, il piano Smart a 5,99 € e il piano One a 9,99€ al mese. Puoi cambiare piano di abbonamento quando preferisci se credi che il tuo piano attuale non rispecchi più le tue esigenze.Se hai bisogno di aiuto non esitare a contattarci al nostro indirizzo hello@pixpay.it Enrico

titre_com: Pixpay has definitely made my life as a…
commentaire: Pixpay has definitely made my life as a parent easier. I deposit money every month into my kids Pixpay card and then they can use it whenever. I gave a 3 star because , the application is still abit confusing to use. I can’t find features easily like other bank applications. To find something in the app I really need to go in circles to find it. For example , I’d like to change the plafond per month but to date I still can not change it. Only because I can’t find it on the app. So maybe if the team can revise the app and make it much more easier to complete tasks on app , would be great. The support team though is very responsive to any questions, fast and very active. A huge plus.
reponses: Hello Susana,With Pixpay, you manage your teenager's spending limits.To do this, go to your Pixpay application, tab CARD, heading "Payment limits".You can increase or decrease the spending limit and, if you wish, you can even remove it completely (by unchecking the box). You can also choose to set a weekly or monthly limit.The change will be reflected immediately on your teenager's card. 🙂Pol

commentaire: If the option was available, I would give -100. I have never experienced such poor service.We opened a joint account and signed up for bancaire mobility - the bank transfers all of your direct debits and standing orders, then closes your account.Requested this in May. Completed the online signatures, gave our old bank’s RIB details etc. Nothing happened. Spoke to bank, we were asked to do it again. 8 times later - still not sorted, asked if we were transferring from a FR to FR bank (the hint was in our RIB number - yes we were).In the end we have had enough and decided to pay the higher fees with Credit Agricole in order to have a peaceful life.ABSOLUTELY USELESS!
reponses: nan

titre_com: Almost impossible to open an account
commentaire: It was one of the most terrible experiences I had when I tried to open an account with Monabanq. I have bank accounts in different countries (Italy, Germany), and I NEVER had 1/10 of the problems I had with them. In a nutshell, it is almost impossible to open an account with them if you just moved to French (it does not matter your condition).And when you try to contact them, they don't answer you (by email), or the people on the chat always say that you need to send an email to another team (which nobody answers you) or call them (if you don't speak French, that is my case, you cannot call them because they don't have any services in English). I kind of understand that they cannot offer a call line with English speakers, but the people on the chat service should AT LEAST try to solve your problem instead of saying you to send an email.

titre_com: Worst bank ever I was with them for…
commentaire: Worst bank ever I was with them for nearly 4 years and asked for a loan a month ago which was approved and I transmitted the documents they asked. They kept on asking for document after document even after confirming with me that in 8 to 12 I will receive my money no no at the 15 day they are saying it could take another 15 days. Just take your money elsewhere they do not care to give good customer service or work in time. Anyways I have cancelled my account and Im taking my business to some other place
reponses: nan

commentaire: Very bad experience.The worst customer service that i've met.I've opened an account and choose the Uniq+ with premier.When I got the card, I've activated it. The next day, my card was rejected. I sent a message to customer service without answer.So I call them and I learn that my account has been closed. But impossible to know why, they use the law which allow them to not inform the reason.Then I've received registered letters to inform me. And also a letter to tell me that my account was in negative.I call again them about the letter and to understand how my account can be negative with a buy of 2€ on 150€. They told me that i was a liar about the letter. I had to send a picture of the letter to prove it ... Finally, the customer service told me that i must ignore the letter, to not call again because it's useless and to not open an account again ... bye
reponses: nan

commentaire: Very useful and user friendly application, totally free of use no hidden costs for banking services. Customer service is very interested and helpful. Strongly recommended.
reponses: Thank you so much for taking your precious time to share your Hello bank! experience. 💎If necessary, our advisors remain available on ☎️ 01 43 63 15 15 (free call) from 📅 Monday to Friday from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. and Saturday from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. but also via social networks, if necessary, with a response within the hour⌚:- 💬 Facebook via Messenger: https://m.me/HelloBankFr/- 💬 X (formerly Twitter): https://x.com/Hellobank_frHave a great day and see you soon at Hello! 🌞Fatia from the Hello Team.

titre_com: Aide transfert fonds Orange Bank vers Hello Bank
commentaire: Face à une difficulté pour transférer les fonds de Orange Bank vers Hello Bank, notre correspondant Hello Bank, Cédric, m'a bien guidée, avec calme et professionnalisme. Merci à lui.Mme Françoise Leclercq
reponses: Hello LECLERCQ FRANÇOISE !Nos conseillers de la Hello Team sont toujours heureux de vous répondre. Quelque soit la demande, ils prennent soin de vous. 🥰Si nécessaire, nos conseillers restent disponible au ☎️ 01 43 63 15 15 (appel gratuit) du 📅 lundi au vendredi de 8h à 20h et le samedi de 8h à 18h mais également via les réseaux sociaux, au besoin, avec une réponse apportée dans l'heure⌚ :- 💬 Facebook via Messenger : https://m.me/HelloBankFr/- 💬 X ( ex Twitter ) : https://x.com/Hellobank_frExcellente soirée à vous et à bientôt chez Hello! 🌞Fatia de la Hello Team.

commentaire: I appreciated that they helped me in a few moment. Very carefull and my problems are always solved without straining my nerves and waiting the responses up to the following days like I used to do so with other banks.

If necessary, our advisors remain available at ☎️ 01 43 63 15 15 (free call) to 📅 Monday to Friday from 8am to 8pm and Saturday from 8am to 6pm but also via social networks, if necessary, with an answer provided within the hour⌚ :- 💬 Facebook Messenger : https://m.me/HelloBankFr/ - 💬 X ( ex Twitter ) : https://x.com/Hellobank_fr Have a nice day 🌞.Sydi de la Hello Team.

commentaire: I am not customer for long time, but up to now everything is really excellent. Opening of the account was quick, delivery of card quick, response from assistance extremely quick and efficient. In addition the monthly fee is extremely attractive comparing to other banks. The only small disadvantage is that instead of Google Pay, french solution Lyf is used which is not accepted in many shops. Hope my satisfaction will last for longer period as I plan to make this bank my primary one.
reponses: Hello Zoric! Thanks for your trust and thanks for your kind feedback 😍If necessary, our advisors remain available at ☎️ 01 43 63 15 15 (free call) from 📅 Monday to Friday from 8am to 8pm and Saturday from 8am to 6pm but also via social networks, if necessary, with an answer provided within the hour⌚ :  - 💬  Facebook via Messenger: https://m.me/HelloBankFr/- 💬  X ( ex Twitter )  : https://x.com/Hellobank_en  Have a good day, see you soon at Hello! 🌞Nasser from the Hello Team

commentaire: So glad I wasn't deterred from changing from my costly BBP Paribas account to the basic, and free, Hello One account by reading the negative reviews. titre_com: not a pleasant service client agent
commentaire: well i contacted them because i noticed some weird activity on my account . after 2 days i contacted again asking why i never got any response.i was worried because all my money is in that account , if someone hacked it, that means they had access to everything. i had a message from someone called maryam , the message was not what i was hoping for.no explanation or anything.  That message could have been written in a nicer and better way.i have been a client of hello bank for the last 2 years , and it was my main bank, it s a shame to change my bank because of one bad experience , this is a first. others were nice enough to explain the situation and get me a refund .

commentaire: Orange bank was about to close, Hello Bank was then suggested as an alternative.My partner has a residence in France but does not speak English. The advisor I had on the phone said communication would be a problem, thus it would be better for him to open an account in one of their offices. Sounds to me more like passing along a "problem" he doesn't want to deal with. When told we were opening an account upon the recommendation of Orange Bank, he broke the number 1 rule of sales personnel. He said and get this, you are not obliged to open an account with us, it was only a recommendation. Bad vibes started from the message he left on my mobile. I played it 4 times to try to catch the name of the company. Never mentioned. This holds truth, one who can't handle small tasks, cannot achieve excellence anywhere.
reponses: Hello S.R,We are sorry to read about this situation. We are indeed a french bank and even if some of our advisors can speak a little english, we do not provide a full english service. The advisor suggested your partner to open an account with BNP Paribas which is our main company and which provide international services and english speaking advisors.Here's the link to follow : https://mabanque.bnpparibas/en/homeWe wish you the best and a nice day.Michael

titre_com: negative experience of Orange transfer to Hello bank
commentaire: If you are ever an expat moving to France you will likely know French banks are unnecessarily discriminatory to the point it feels like racist behaviour.  Well I have an account with Orange Bank and pay all my bills in France thru it.  We are emailed to say Orange is closing and offered an account with Hello,  expected to Agree to the transfer of all my information, closure of one account and opening of another.  Offered cash for moving and upsold unwanted premium features, hours obliging this to be declined an account with zero explanation or knowledge of what happens now to my account funds!  Once again I feel that banks are pooping on its customers?  At least provide a credible customer service link not a robot!!  I see in the threads this is not going well for with Orange or BNP?  I don't like some expats of travellers think that French banks should speak English - but at this point due to the unhelpful and discriminatory actions - I do feel I will just withdraw all my money and avoid business in France.  Its shameful and bad business, people will remember and eventually you will loose!  Not surprised Orange was a flop!All customers are valuable, perhaps a bit of care?
reponses: Hello Andrew,Sorry to read you 😔 Please respond to the request for information sent today📧 so that I can investigate on my side please. Nice day to you. 🌞 Nasser from the Hello team.

Do not go with them even if they are the only bank to give you a RIB!!!ZERO STARS

commentaire: Applied to open a basic bank account online supplying all documents requested. It took over 2 wks with various further requests for more documents being sent. I eventually was given my IBAN & made a token €10 transfer. To then receive an email saying I do not qualify for this account so they closed it????? My €10 was transferred back & no explanation given why the account was closed. Am concerned this is some kind of scam with all the personal information they now have from me. Extremely annoying pointless exercise. Don't waste your time applying for a Hello Account
reponses: nan

commentaire: I had a pretty poor experience with this bank. I registered with them and transferred the required 300€ (you can’t open an account otherwise), no news for a month, the online chat person was of no help, finally gave them a call only to find out there was a bug in their system and my request hadn’t been processed. They weren’t aware of the bug and didn’t apologise.
reponses: nan

titre_com: Hallo bank has lost my funds of 6000…
commentaire: Hallo bank has lost my funds of 6000 Euro I wanted to transfer. The money was sent - but never arrived on the other account. Now I have been chasing them for almost two months to recall the funds. Still no clear response on the status. Really disappointing and unprofessional. I now do my transfers with another bank.
reponses: nan

titre_com: iOS app limited to those with 'France'…
commentaire: iOS app limited to those with 'France' selected as the country associated with their Apple ID.So, if you recently moved (or moved back) to France then you cannot use the app without changing the country of your iOS account (which means that some of your other apps will stop working).Wretched, awful example of a normal bank pretending to be a real online bank. I wouldn't need to be a customer at all except flagrant IBAN discrimination is so rife in France that I need an IBAN that starts with FR.
reponses: nan

titre_com: It's hard to recommend Hello Bank
commentaire: It's hard to recommend Hello Bank at this stage for the following reasons:1. While the staff are friendly on the phone, they have been so disempowered and poorly informed that there isn't any point in calling them because they can't do much.2. It takes several days for anyone to respond to messages via the app.3. The apps and integration are last-generation. Adjust your expectations of functionality.We can't say we weren't warned; the promotional materials show a picture of a customer literally bending over backwards in order to use Hello Bank.
reponses: nan

commentaire: This bank is bad! The overall experience of having an account with Hello Bank is just horrible! They opened my account and shipped me a Debit Card with an "anti-filter" fraud. In their world, this means I can't do online transactions, contactless transactions, normal transactions or add my card to Apple Pay, etc. Basically, by enabling the so-called anti-fraud filter, they have made my card useless. When I contacted customer service they gave me different answers for why it was not working. None of them fixed it. I had to face the embarassment of having a €5 transaction rejected in front of a whole supermarket queue.
reponses: nan

commentaire: As an existing client of BNP Paribas, I proceeded to open an account at Hello Bank. Thinking I would be able to open an account faster (since Hello Bank is the property of BNP Paribas), my request has been declined a couple of days later.I then proceeded to contact their Customer Support, which told me that they had studied my request, but declined it "without giving any additional information", indicating "they are not required to provide a reason".Stay away. Horrible honestly. If you're truly looking for an online bank, try Boursorama Banque instead. I've had no problem ever since I joined them a couple of months ago (plus they support Google Pay, unlike the useless and slow Paylib system supported by Hello Bank).
reponses: nan

commentaire: Worst bank EVER !!!!! I cannot stress this enough. NEVER EVER use their service - if it can even be called a service... Weird waiting times between every new service you want to add to your account, 24h approval for new beneficiaries, 48 hours to have any change approved, 5 days for random codes to come to you by post (often at the wrong address..) this bank should be called slow bank. Calling customer service teaches you patience because waiting for about 20 min each time is the norm. Having maximum amounts for every transfer you make, every withdrawal you do... max 400€ for 7 days, max 1000€ for every month - read it here because they will not tell you this! All of this and much more is to be expected when opening an account at this joke of a bank. Prepare.
reponses: nan

titre_com: Hello bank is the worst bank I have…
commentaire: Hello bank is the worst bank I have ever dealt with. I have lived in 5 countries and worked with banks around the world and this is BY FAR the worst ! Without any notification they shut down my bank account, froze my funds, stopped responding to my messages and calls and blocked me on Instagram when I made a comment !Finally when I got to speak with someone after 3 weeks of repeatedly calling I spoke to the rudest, snarkiest and worst customerrepresentative I have ever had to deal with. And I’ve been to the DMV in New York City multiple times !  Do not use this online bank they behave like criminals ! Hold my money hostage and not speaking with their clients. I have sent 10 messages without a response over the course of 3 weeks. NEVER start an account with them! This is one of the worst mistakes I’ve ever made !
reponses: nan

commentaire: I have had my account with Hello Bank for few years now ( secondary account).Luckily I do not rely on them on daily basis.I needed to withdraw cash. What they consider a high amount.  There is document you should fill up and sign then go to BNP bank for your withdrawal... it took me a whole week hours of calls ...their team did not have a clue about the process! I called them to send me another code for my card. I moved to a new address then my wife asked them to change the address by sending a document from the electricity provider. They said the do not accept that one. I said you sent me a card and I do not have a code. How am I going to use it?Know that I paid 15€ for the card. They do not care.Never open an account with them, they are awful, never willing to help you out... they are there just to make sure it is as hard as it be for you! I asked to speak to the manager they said impossible. We do not do thatLike he/ she is a god. No wonder they have bad reviews I spoke to Mrs: CAROLINE SIROT
reponses: nan

titre_com: The reasons why you should not use Hello Bank
commentaire: There have been a number of issues. Setting up the account was very straightforward. Once you deposit money into the account, it is very difficult to transfer and withdraw money. Anything over 6,000 euros requires approval. It takes a number of days before you can get access to your own money.Large amounts over 100,000 euros require various information which was supplied and accepted, yet validation of the sums can only be signed off by one person in the whole of Hello Bank. This could take a number of days to validate. The staff were very hostile and unhelpful to the extent that one customer service advisor refused to speak English and said that she was forbidden to speak English with me.I phoned up and was given various information by a number of agents, stating that my transfer would be signed off the following day. I phone up again to check and was told that the manager to sign off was not in until after the weekend. I made if clear that this is my money, I am not asking the bank for their money. I did everything I needed to do and am still awaiting my transfer to be validated. I have now had to engage a solicitor to act on my behalf, which will cost me money to have Hello Bank release my money. There is no complaint structure to get any help or satisfaction from this company. You are left to the incompetent and unprofessional customer service advisors, misinforming you and preventing you from releasing your own money. I therefore advise anybody who is thinking of doing any business with Hello Bank or subsidiary to stay clear. This is from a very very very dissatisfied and unhappy customer. If I can put a rating on Hello Bank, there would be no star. I am still waiting for my money to be released and no valid explanation has been given to me.
reponses: nan

commentaire: WORST BANK EVER, LIERS WONT LET ME QUIT BANK,LOL.
reponses: nan

commentaire: First, Hellobank = BNP Paribas. You have to know this, especially because that point will get ridiculous quite fast. The loans that you get are signed by BNP Paribas, the emails that you send are received in a single mailbox. This proves to be a pain as, if you have both a BNP Paribas AND an Hellobank one, the advisor you'll end up talking to will be lost in that sea of messages, and won't understand what you're asking for.Also, if you manage to obtain an exemption from early repaiment indemnities, they'll give you an endorsment. But it's probably gonna be a fake one, like mine. They put issues in it and then, after several years, the day you need it, they'll refuse it and say that endorsment wasn't actually aiming at YOUR credit. you can prove that they send it to you, you can prove that your name was on it, you only had ONE credit, but no, they'll say it's not yours. What... And don't expect that you're gonna be able to repay with your own money when you sell you appartement. No no no, that won't work either! They'll tell you that it's not your own money. It's the money of another bank (Hellobank VS BNP Paribas !!!), so it's not yours. That's usually when your head blows off.After that, when the reimbursment is finally achieved and you expect to be done with it, know that, even if you suscribed a BNP insurance (Cardif), it won't close by itself. No no no, you even have to do communication within the enterprise for them. They're probably sending mail through horses between their buildings and they get lost on the way...There's also no free immediate transfer unlike other online banks.They're gonna ask you for handwritten stuff like in the 90sSponsorship is scarce, not that interesting and easily refused.To sum it up, it's quite hard to get a worse online bank, I'd suggest to go... just anywhere else.And for the notice, I can prove everything I said.
reponses: nan
nan

commentaire: Rubbish. Avoid like plague. Opened the account months ago and noticed on my app they blocked it. So I popped a question why my account blocked. After 2 days got the answer: we got notified from administration your company is ceased. We do not offer personal account. Ffs. What a a bunch of incompetent........Mama told me ask before shooting.The company does exist, its barely operating on 500nm². The Shine account receives all card processing and online website income. Connected to all business related suppliers and debits and of course to URSAF. Anyone can look up nowdays a company if they have any doubt. Even a 5 years old sitting on a toilette can do that. Don't need a degree for it. The administration made a mistake and they corrected it. Maybe you should communicate with your own customers before you making decisions. Or hire a 5 years old to do that for you.

commentaire: Déplorable le service client SHINE.Suite à la création d'une entreprise il y a un mois, j'ai ouvert un compte en ligne shine, et alimenté celui-ci.Alors que des transactions étaient en cours type virement pour des fournisseurs, mon compte a été brutalement bloqué.La raison Shine me demande de leur communiquer ma dernière attestation URSSAF, je pensais pourtant avoir à faire à des experts.Je ne comprends pas déjà cette procédure et ces méthodes de bloquer un compte ainsi que toutes les opérations en cours, car on parle là bien de compte pro.Ensuite les experts de Shine devraient se former un peu plus aux formalités de création d'une entreprise, en effet les services URSSAF ne sont disponibles qu'à partir de l'embauche du premier salarié, et la création d'un compte URSSAF intervient que 4 à 6 semaines ensuite après cette embauche, en cette période de covit des délais sont certainement rallongés, sachant que nous venons de faire tout récemment nos déclarations préalable à l'embauche.Comment osez-vous donc bloquer un compte pro, en exigeant une attestation URSSAF pour une société qui vient d'être créé.j'avais été pourtant était emballé dans un premier temps par cette banque en ligne mais là je suis totalement déçu avec, des fonds de plusieurs milliers d'euros bloqués.Je ne peux que constater l'amateurisme de #Shine d'autant plus qui n'existe aucun numéro de téléphone pour les contacter.Deplorable SHINE customer service. Following the creation of a company a month ago, I opened an online shine account, and funded it. While transactions were in progress such as wire transfers for suppliers, my account was brutally blocked. Reason Shine asks me to communicate to them my last URSSAF certificate, I thought, however, that I had to deal with experts. I do not already understand this procedure and these methods of blocking an account and all operations in progress, because we are talking about pro account. Then Shine's experts should be trained a little more in the formalities of setting up a business, in fact URSSAF services are only available from the hiring of the first employee, and the creation of a URSSAF account occurs  4 to 6 weeks after this hiring, in this period of covit times are certainly extended, knowing that we have just made our declarations very recently before hiring. How dare you therefore block a professional account, by requiring a URSSAF certificate for a company that has just been created. I had however been excited at first by this online bank but there I am totally disappointed with, funds of several thousand euros blocked. I can only note the amateurism of #Shine all the more since there is no phone number to contact them.
reponses: nan
Bonjour Clara,Merci pour votre petit mot 😊Belle journée,Franck de Shine
nan
nan
nan

commentaire: Je suis un client satisfait de La Poste Ma French Bank depuis environ 3 ans.  Jusqu’à ma conversation d’aujourd’hui avec l’un de vos agents du service client, j’aurais recommandé vos services à tout le monde.  Cependant, en raison de l'attitude et de l'impolitesse de l'homme avec qui j'ai parlé dans votre service client aujourd'hui à 10h30, mon opinion sur Ma French Bank a complètement changé.  ironiquement, j'ai contacté votre service client car j'étais en train d'ouvrir un compte chez vous pour ma fille de 12 ans.  Potentiellement, elle aurait pu être une de vos clientes à vie, mais elle a entendu ma conversation avec votre représentant et son attitude grossière. Sa réponse a été qu'elle voulait ouvrir son premier compte bancaire auprès d'une autre banque parce qu'elle n'aimait pas le ton de votre représentant.  avec moi et moi non plus.I've been been a happy customer of La Poste Ma French Bank for about 3 years. Until my conversation today with one of your customer service agents,  I would have recommended your services to anyone and everyone. However, due to the attitude and rudeness of the man I spoke to in your customer service department today at 10h30, my opinion of Ma French Bank has completely changed. ironically, I contacted your customer service department because I was in the process of opening an account with yourselves for my 12 year old daughter. Potentially she could have been a life long customer of yours, but she overheard my conversation with your representative and his rude manner, her response was that she wanted to open her first bank account with a different bank because she didn't like your representatives tone with me and neither did I.
reponses: Bonjour David, Merci d'avoir pris le temps de nous laisser cet avis, nous aimerions en savoir plus pouvez-vous nous contacter via Messenger, X ou Instagram afin que nous puissions voir cela ensemble ? L'équipe Ma French Bank.

commentaire: French banks are terrible. Even then ma French bank manage to stand out as more terrible than the others.  Incapable of doing a bank transfer and then when an automatic payment is supposed to come out there are insufficient funds. Their fault but they will then charge €16 for failing to have funds available. Go to any other bank - better still use Wise or Revolut and avoid terrible French banks entirely. An update, if you contact them through Twitter, they respond but are still just as incompetent - taking over 2 hours of chat to NOT fix something that an idiot could rectify. The point stands that they are completely useless
reponses: Bonjour, Nous aimerions en savoir davantage sur votre dossier, je vous invite a nous contacter via Messenger, Twitter ou Instagram pour vous aider ! L'équipe Ma French Bank.

commentaire: Super Rude customer service guy. Closed my account because i didnt speak French well enough.Didnt bother to ascertain i have a speech impediment which makes my French difficult. Asked a French colleague to step in and speak for me and the customer service guy just decided that he will close my account. Am writing a formal complaint to the company asking for a copy of their terms saying that you have to speak French Regards Bradley Jones
reponses: Bonjour Bradley, Je suis navrée de lire la situation, je vous invite a nous contacter via Messenger afin que nous puissions vous renseigner.Excellente journée, L'équipe Ma French Bank.

commentaire: Never ever again! For 6 months and over 7 times asked to get the verification code to start the app. Never received the mail. Support service is nice but  no use as the process of sending the codes is not set up properly via recommended letters, not the cheapest simple ones that always get lost. Hours spent on the phone to explain the situation,  even offered to pay myself that recommended letter.
reponses: nan

titre_com: 2 mins to open account , 2 months to close
commentaire: Website looks like its still in testing phase, application is even worse! I never received the card and it took me more than 2 months to close the account (which im not sure if its yet closed). Also, noone speaks english, do not get confused by the english-like name they have .Pros: The guys in the Messenger are responsive.
reponses: nan

titre_com: Trying to make contact with MFB is…
commentaire: Trying to make contact with MFB is virtually impossible. I telephoned endless number of times, waited for more than half a an hour - still no response. There is no email address one can use to contact them. Disgusted by the impossibility of making contact, I wanted to close the account. Only way to do it, send informatiion by registered post. A week later, received email confirmation of reception of my letter (no-response email address), stating my account would be closed within a month!! A month, ridiculous. No doubt they just want to be able to make another monthly account charge. KEEP WELL AWAY FROM MFB.
reponses: Bonjour,Navré pour les difficultés que vous rencontrez nos équipes sont disponibles via Messenger et Twitter pour des informations complémentaires,Rémy

titre_com: Don't create an account on this bank
commentaire: Don't create an account on this bank! I asked for 3 letters for activation and never arrived. I called support a lot of times and they do nothing!! Trust me!! You will lose the money you put there!
reponses: Bonjour,Navré pour les difficultés rencontrés,Nos conseillers sont disponibles via Messenger ou Twitter pour des informations complémentaires,Rémy

commentaire: Stay away! Worst bank ever!I haven't been able to access my money since i open the account, 3 months ago. I never received any of the 3 cards that they supposedly sent me. There was no way i could access my money (they wouldn't allow me to transfer money to my partner or a friend, so that i could have some cash). 1,5 month ago, i sent a letter to close the account. I am still waiting on my money (even though it supposedly should take 30 days). The people at the hotline are completely useless. The only thing they can do is blame whatever is happening on other service providers (the post office for the cards i never received, my email provider for emails i should have received but never did, etc.). If i didn't have a partner, i wouldn't have been able to eat, pay my rent, live my life.
reponses: nan

titre_com: Votre application ma french banque ca…
commentaire: Votre application ma french banque ca match pas et je ne arive pas alignmente mon carte depuis le site
reponses: Bonjour Alex,J'aimerais en savoir plus sur, pour continuer à discuter ensemble, je vous invite à nous contacter sur nos réseaux sociaux, sur Facebook Messenger ? (ici 👉 http://m.me/MaFrenchBank ) ou sur Twitter ? (ici 👉 https://twitter.com/MaFrenchBank).Merci pour votre témoignage. L’expérience de nos clients nous tient sincèrement à cœur. Nos équipes travaillent quotidiennement pour enrichir notre offre et répondre au mieux à chaque besoin. Nous ferons notre maximum pour vous accompagner.Bonne journée,Louis de la French Team

titre_com: My teen is without card since several…
commentaire: My teen is without card since several weeks. Again and again we are assured that a card has been sent, but no card ever arrived. There is no customer service. You are constantly wasting your time chatting with bots. If you have a real person (and you cannot really be sure of that because the answers are standardised) they promise to solve the problem but nothing happens. Yet, we have to pay for the card and the subscription. Kard does not share any proof that a card was ever sent. I have asked to be reimbursed and to receive my money back. We will see how long it takes. Great deception. It would be a good if they had customer service. Update: after several weeks and repeated lies about cards having been sent, I asked to close the account and be reimbursed. It is then that Kard informed me that their cards are out of stock! And they have no idea when cards will be restocked.
reponses: nan

commentaire: I tried to open an account for my son. I did everything requested, and scanned my documents. I was told they were accepted. However, after three weeks, the card had not arrived. When I tried to login, I was told my email address did not exist.  One of the employees looked into the problem, and told me she could not understand. She later got back to me and told me that my identity card did not conform to French standard. This is very strange as I have a French identity card. I also do not understand why they did not tell me about this problem before.  From the small amount of experience I have with this company, I can see that they are not a company to trust.
reponses: nan

commentaire: Opened an account 2 weeks ago. Quick and easy. First day the app worked fine, 2 days later I couldn't read who made the transfers. Reported problem, was told it would be fixed. Been trying to get in touch in multiple ways for over a week now, but no response. Starting to get troublesome.
reponses: Marjan, votre avis m'étonne. Nous sommes bien revenu vers vous à la suite de votre mail. Vos virements ont bien été exécutés. N'hésitez pas à revenir vers votre conseiller, il sera ravi de vous aider ! — Nina

titre_com: Have a cap on withdrawals per month
commentaire: The bank has a cap on how many transactions you are allowed per month. I haven't been able to access my money for the past week and no one answers queries on weekends.In response to their response, their exceptional increase was permitting me 10 more contactless transactions in the month. I don't think raising a query Saturday morning and receiving a response Monday morning is sufficient, especially as I didn't have access to the money in my account all weekend and still don't, despite their response.La banque a un plafond sur le nombre de transactions que vous êtes autorisé par mois. Je n'ai pas pu accéder à mon argent la semaine dernière et personne ne répond aux questions le week-end.En réponse à leur réponse, leur augmentation exceptionnelle me permettait 10 transactions sans contact de plus dans le mois. Je ne pense pas qu'il soit suffisant de poser une question le samedi matin et de recevoir une réponse le lundi matin, d'autant plus que je n'ai pas eu accès à l'argent de mon compte tout le week-end et que je ne l'ai toujours pas, malgré leur réponse.
reponses: Vous nous avez contactés samedi, et dès lundi matin, votre conseillère dédiée a pu vous proposer une hausse exceptionnelle du plafond de votre carte. Tout à fait conscients de la gêne occasionnée, nous sommes navrés que vous estimiez notre service à une étoile. — Florian

commentaire: Le paiement sans-contact à fonctionnement aléatoire.Absence de la fonctionnalité Apple-pay.
reponses: Je vous remercie pour votre retour, Nicolas. Je vois que vous avez utilisé votre carte sans contact à plusieurs reprises. N'hésitez pas à contacter votre conseillère si vous constatez un comportement erratique. Nous procéderons naturellement à un nouvel envoi. Notez qu'après un certain nombre de transactions, il est nécessaire d’insérer la carte dans un terminal pour des raisons de sécurité. Le paiement mobile est attendu. Nous travaillons à son intégration. Je vous souhaite d'excellentes fêtes. — Florian

Ces cinq étoiles comptent pour nous. Merci ! — Nina

We're thrilled to hear that Green-Got has restored your faith in online payment services.Our team is committed to providing excellent customer care service, and we're proud to support projects that align with your values. Your support means the world to us! 🌿

titre_com: Une initiative à la hauteur de l'enjeu climatique
commentaire: An initiative that meets the climate challenge.The team is listening. The offer evolves in accordance with customer requests.By using Green Got as a bank, I feel that I am part of a whole that can shake up the fossilized ideas of other banks.Thanks.Une initiative à la hauteur de l'enjeu climatique. L'équipe est à l'écoute. L'offre évolue en accord avec les demandes des clients. En utilisant Green Got comme banque, je sens que je fais partie d'un tout qui peut faire bouger les idées fossilisées des autres banques. Merci.
reponses: It's great to know that our initiative resonates with you! We're always ready to listen to our members and strive to develop our offer in line with their needs. Together, we can make a real difference in the transition to more sustainable financial practices. 🌱Thank you for your support and for being with us, Roxane! C'est super de savoir que notre initiative trouve écho chez vous ! Nous sommes toujours à l'écoute de nos membres et nous nous efforçons de faire évoluer notre offre en accord avec leurs besoins. Ensemble, nous pouvons faire une réelle différence dans la transition vers des pratiques financières plus durables. 🌱Merci pour votre soutien et d'être parmi nous, Roxane !

commentaire: Great service with outstanding People always at ones disposal to address issues and answer questions. And when the overall mandate and DNA is to contribue genuinely to a cleaner better sustainable world... What else?! Thanks very much Green Got to be by our sides.
reponses: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you've had a great experience with our team and that you appreciate our commitment to creating a cleaner and more sustainable world. Your support means a lot to us, and we're grateful to have you on this journey with us. Thank you for choosing Green-Got. 💚

commentaire: I highly recommend it. This is without doubt the banking model that must prevail for our future. The bank is in full development, with a multitude of new projects and features on the horizon. I couldn't wait to switch to Green-got.
reponses: Thank you for your enthusiastic recommendation, Yann! We're thrilled to hear that you believe in our banking model and our vision for the future. We're constantly evolving and developing new projects and features to better serve our members and the planet. We're excited to have you as part of the Green-got community! 🌿

commentaire: Hyper réactive, all is easy and fast but not only ! Vert humain and kind team that use your money for ethical ans sustainable projets. Vert proud to make a team with them, They are thé future !
reponses: Merci infiniment pour ce retour chaleureux ! C'est un plaisir de savoir que vous trouvez notre équipe réactive et notre service facile et rapide. Votre soutien à nos projets éthiques et durables est très apprécié. Ensemble, nous construisons un futur durable. 🌍

titre_com: Having an impact with your bank account
commentaire: Traditional banks use the money in accounts of their customers to invest in diverse projects - looking at risks and profits, but not their environmental impact.Green-got is one of the too rare banking solution which only invest in sustainable projects. Besides, you can also track the CO2 footprint of your own day-to-day expenses, useful to know where you stand and how you can improve in the future.Great solution which I hope will become mainstream in a near future!
reponses: Hello Benjamin 🦊 I see that impact is dear to you. We released our second impact report last week (available on our networks and website) so that you can see how much we are making a difference together! Our calculations of C02 footprint will be more and more precise and transparency will always be a core value 🌎 to be continued

commentaire: Outstanding support! The person I had on the chat went out of their way to provide me with a solution to my problem. Even though it took some time, I got updated all the time without even me asking.Can't recommend enough
reponses: Thank you for the fantastic feedback, Thibaud ! We're thrilled that our support team was able to provide a satisfying solution and that you appreciated the regular updates. Your recommendation means a lot to us. You can always reach out if you need assistance in the future.🌟

commentaire: Why continue to deposit your money in a bank that will use it to finance, among other things, fossil fuels, when GreenGot exists? This neo-bank has everything a great one has to offer, the user experience is simply perfect and the money deposited is secure. I use it on a daily basis and, in practice, nothing has changed compared to my old bank, except that basically everything has changed! Thanks to GreenGot for existing and to Maud's team for developing it.Pourquoi continuer à déposer son argent dans une banque qui l'utilisera pour financer, entre autres, les énergies fossiles, quand GreenGot existe ? Cette néo-banque a tout d'une grande, l'expérience utilisateur est simplement parfaite et l'argent déposé est sécurisé. Je l'utilise au quotidien et, en pratique, rien n'a changé par rapport à mon ancienne banque, sauf qu'au fond, tout a changé ! Merci à GreenGot d'exister et à l'équipe de Maud de la développer.
reponses: "Rien a changé mais tout a changé" c'est une bonne idée de slogan ça ! 🔥 Merci à vous, c'est grâce à nos membres que tout est possible. On se répète mais c'est si vrai ! L'union fait la force 💪🏻

titre_com: The bank of the future is here

reponses: Transparent + communicative + care = Wow, thank YOU 🙌🏻 it means a lot to the team ! Nothing without you 😍

commentaire: Greengot is a bank that has the best user service and experience. The bank is listening to it's client and is always searching for improvement. Their goal to invest in ecological and with low-impact subjects is a good vision for a bank. Thanks a lot to them and their action !

commentaire: Love green got. Their team is super sweet, they are easy to reach. I am happy that my money is not funding  climate change, but instead projects to fix it. Also, as green got builds their features they look at what their users ask for and constantly keep them updated. Amazing.
